address: 39276 Combermere Rd, Combermere, ON K0J 1L0, Canada
description:
Do you want to unwind, unplug and truly immerse yourself in nature? If you're planning a family getaway, we welcome you to stay in beautiful Combermere cottage country. Contact us now! This is a first time rental for an extremely loved, well taken care of, family owned cabin for almost 60 years! You don't want to miss out on this opportunity for an unexpected last minute cabin rental available in August!!


It is still summer, but if you've been waiting to take a long awaited vacation or want a quiet, peaceful retreat to work remotely when the autumn leaves begin to turn, this is the place. There is no better location to see the beauty of the fall colours than here.


This beautiful, log cabin looks like it could be on a Canadian postcard. It is nestled on a beautiful double treed lot with breathtaking views of Negeek Lake and the Madawaska River. Open the door and this rustic, cozy cabin beckons for you to escape it all. From the gorgeous log walls to the unique and ornate headboards made of branches and log pieces, this place is one of a kind. The open concept allows plenty of room and sleeps up to 4 adults and 2 children comfortably.


Spend days at the water and evenings by the fire pit listening to the loons. This river is their haven. On rainy nights curl up on one of the day beds with a book or enjoy the roomy space and large table for a game of cards. Best of all, brace yourself for sunsets that will take your breath away. The spacious and flat lot is also perfect to set up a net for volleyball or badminton, or just let the kids play! The cabin is located on a quiet dead end road, so it's safe and perfect for a walk or bike ride.


The whole area is absolutely stunning and offers clear water, sandy shores, waterways to explore, amazing restaurants and a variety of lovely shops with unique items. All of this keeps people coming back year after year. Algonquin Park is only an hour away, so it's perfect for a day trip. When you want to get away from the hustle and bustle, we welcome you to a peaceful retreat that you can enjoy with family and friends, or on your own. Located only 2 hours west of Ottawa and a few hours north of Toronto, this could be yours for an end of the summer or fall getaway.


Want to get out on the river? Explore over 90 km of waterways with great fishing and boating. The 150 feet of natural shoreline has a sandy bottom with a gradual slope, so you have peace of mind when the kids are in the water. Feel free to bring your own watercraft or rent a boat from a nearby marina right across the river. Our 24 foot dock is at your disposal, and a boat launch is only 5 minutes away.


We ask that you please bring your own towels and linens, as well as drinking water.


Everything you need for a fun filled holiday awaits you here. We hope to see you!

Looking for a young female professional to be my roommate. Move in OCT 1 OR NOV 1.


The apartment:

1 unfurnished bedroom in a spacious 1000sq. ft. furnished apartment in the heart of Westboro. Bright, big windows, hardwood floors, newly renovated bathroom and kitchen. I have lived here for three years and absolutely love the apartment and location.

*Pictures reflect two different living room layouts

**If you have an apartment sized couch or dining set that you want to bring, I may be willing to get rid of the current ones. Desk also available to keep in bedroom for studying/WFH.


Half a block up from Richmond Rd. Five minute walk from Superstore, Farmboy, LCBO, Westboro Village shops, 10 min walk to Westboro bus station. Located right by the Byron pathway, awesome for biking and walking.


$950/month includes all utilities and parking. Rent, high speed bell internet, hydro, insurance, laundry, parking. Rent would be due on the 25th of the month, and will only change if the cost of utilities changes significantly, which I don't anticipate happening as I have lived here for over two years and it has barely fluctuated.

6 month contract with option to go month-to-month after.


About me:

I am a 26 year old professional who works downtown on weekdays and at a restaurant on evenings/weekends. I am an extroverted introvert - I love my quiet time at home and am okay if we keep to ourselves, but also would be more than happy to have someone to share wine and good food with! I am very athletic, love to cook, but am at home very little due to my busy work schedule. I keep the house extremely tidy and need someone who is looking to share the responsibility of cleaning and keeping the space neat. I do not have guests often, especially now with covid, and would hopefully find someone who also isn't trying to entertain too frequently. Ideal roommate is also a young female professional with a day job, someone who is friendly and respectful and financially secure.


Please reply to this post with some information about yourself and we can set up a time to meet!

Thank you,

Katie

At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

address: 235 Kent St, Ottawa, ON K2P 0A5, Canada
description:
Furnished upscale one bedroom condo for rent in downtown Ottawa

Tag: apartment, one bed room

This bright, spacious, well designed condo is located in a luxury condo building built by Charlesfort in downtown Ottawa. Short walk to Parliament Hill, the new LRT, and the Rideau Center. 680 square feet excluding the balcony area, and 9 foot ceilings. Comes with a private balcony facing south. Being a corner unit, it has windows on both the east and south sides.

Comes with refrigerator, dish washer, stove, microwave oven, toaster, in suite laundry washer/dryer, granite counter top, hardwood flooring, and air conditioning. Includes a storage locker in the underground parking area.

The bedroom is furnished with a queen sized bed, two bedside dressers, bedside lamps, sheets, comforter and pillows.

The living room is furnished with a leather love seat and a matching leather arm chair, a 42” 4K TV, and a side table. The dining area is furnished with a round glass dining table with three chairs from EQ3. The kitchen area includes a blender, cutlery, cutting board, bowls, plates, etc.

Rent includes all utilities, an underground parking spot, and unlimited internet.

The condo complex itself comes with fitness rooms, indoor lounges equipped with fridges and TVs, 21 visitor parking spots, keyless (fob) entry, and roof top BBQ terraces with washrooms and fridges.

Available October 1 or November 1 or a day in September

Will only respond if you provide your work email address and basic information about you as a tenant.

Viewings are available only to those who are potential suitable tenants to minimize disturbing the current tenant.

New Townhouse 3 bedroom 2.5 baths in Riverside South for rent

Modern 3 Bedroom, 2 1/2 Bathroom Townhouse with 2 ensuites and finished basement in Ottawa's Popular Neighborhood Riverside South! Ceramic and dark hardwood floors on the main level. Large kitchen with lots of cupboards and additional pantry, black granite counters and extended island with breakfast bar. The living room has large windows for plenty of sunlight. Walk to public transit and the new French Catholic Elementary School Jonthan-Pitre.

2 spacious bedrooms on the second floor, a full bathroom and a linen cabinet; There is a 3rd bedroom and a powder room in the basement. Every bedroom has its own large closet. CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

description:

MINIMUN 6 MONTHS RENTAL. PREFERENCES FOR 12 MONTHS AND LONGER.

1 BEDROOM FURNISHED WALK UOTTAWA DOWNTOWN. JUST BRING YOUR PERSONAL ITEMS.

POTS, PANS, GLASS, CUP, ETC IS ALREADY IN THE CONDO

Condo is clean and nobody lives there since April. So no Covid

Available now or August 01. Condo is a 1 Bed plus Den and 1Bath. It's a few minutes walk to the Rideau Canal, Downtown, the By Market, Ottawa university (5 minute walk), the Parliament, and many parks. Great for sightseeing & museums lovers!

The space

Address: 238 Besserer, Ottawa, Ontario. K1N 6B1

500 metres (0.3 mile) to Ottawa Convention Center.

****************************************************************

Hello all, Bonjour à vous, Hola,

Welcome to my luxury condo with air-conditioned and heated underground parking (+ 175$/month). It has 600 sq. feet. The condo faces east so plenty of sunlight. Pool, sauna, BBQ, gym, rooms’ access is included. The condo has 1 bedroom ( 1 QUEEN) size bed with 1 full bathrooms and all the appliances including free usage of washing machine & dryer in the condo; you even don’t need to go outside to do your laundry. Plus, your own balcony is included.

To complement the comfort and all the furniture in place, my condo offers the following attributes:

•LOCATION. The condo is located in the HEART of DOWNTOWN meaning you are BESIDE or VERY close to everything.

•From the Ottawa MacDonald-Cartier AIRPORT, it is a 20 minutes drive (15km or 9 miles) with a car or a taxi Or, the public transit express bus # 97, and in 35 minutes, it will bring you to downtown, and from there, you are less than 5 minutes WALK to my condo.

•From the condo, it is a 5 minute WALK to everything like the famous By-Market, The Canal Rideau, the Parliament Hill, Rideau Centre (for shopping mall), Ottawa University, government buildings, and many more.

• Grocery stores (Metro and Loblaws open 24h/24), liquor & beer store -LCBO- , Bus & Transitway, Ottawa Little Theatre, pharmacy, boutique, restaurants, coffee shop, bar & terrace, cinema, bookstores are less than 1 minute WALK.

•MUSEUMS – GALLERIES at walkable distance (5-20 minutes) to most of Ottawa’s big museums.

•OTTAWA CONVENTION CENTER within 5 minutes WALK or 500 meters (0.3 mile).

•Please contact me if you want further details.

And welcome to Ottawa!

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Avalon Park offers a welcoming escape from the city with high-end amenities in a park-like setting, all just minutes from Elmvale Shopping Centre and Highway 417. Located in a quiet neighbourhood, Avalon Park provides the perfect place for young families, working professionals and seniors to call home. Enjoy amenities like an outdoor pool, plenty of green space, a theatre room and much more.

SOUTHEAST OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Young professionals, families and mature adults love everything Avalon Park offers:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments, fitness facility, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, newly renovated kitchens with three appliances, and an ideal location close to public transportation and the Queensway. Avalon Park has it all, location, convenience and high-end amenities.

Whether you love to have friends over, host play dates for your kids or view your home as your own private sanctuary, we have a floor plan that's perfect for you. Newly-renovated kitchens, well-designed bathrooms with ceramic flooring and professionally-designed lobby and common areas are just a few of the features you'll love to come home to.

Avalon Park is also all about location. We're just minutes from Elmvale Acres Shopping Centre and St. Laurent Shopping Centre, which includes numerous restaurants, the Ottawa Public Library, coffee shops, and much more!

Call 613-454-5781 today to schedule your private tour.

description:

- 5 parking spots (1 in garage and 4 on driveway)

- Utilities is extra

address: 1410 Orillia St, Ottawa, ON K1H 7N7, Canada
description:
Located in the beautiful neighbourhood of Alta Vista. This basement apartment is furnished. It has two new quality beds and new dressers. If you want to provide your own beds, you can. It includes a Lay-Z-Boy recliner couch and a reclining easy chair. One or two adults only, no children. A very quiet household, no smoking, no pets.

Rent $1695 monthly includes electricity, heat, water, high speed internet, cable TV, Central Air, gas fireplace, private laundry with washer/dryer, parking for 2 cars.

1200 sq ft apartment with separate entrance. 10 minutes to three hospitals. 2 large bedrooms have tons of closet storage. Bathroom has large shower. Kitchen has a self cleaning oven and frig, double sink. Entire apt floor is ceramic tile.

You only have to provide your own cell phone. Located 1 block to buses east/west and north/south. Rent by direct deposit. One year lease required. Available now.

address: , Ottawa K1K1X2 ON, Canada
description: Available November 1st, 2020. Luxurious 3 bedroom 2 bathroom newly renovated house for rent walking distance to grocery stores and the Ottawa train station. I'd prefer to rent the entire house out but I'm also interested in renting the rooms separately if anyone is interested in a roommate arrangement. The Master bedroom has a Queen sized bed in addition to a brand new private ensuite bathroom. The second bedroom has a double bed and the main floor bedroom has a single bed sharing the newly renovated first floor bathroom. Everything is newly renovated with a spacious fenced backyard and a brand new 500 square foot deck not to mention the new washer/dryer. The location is very convenient located only 900m from the VIA rail and Tremblay LRT stations and even closer to the St. Laurent Mall but you can drive downtown in about 10 minutes. There's several grocery stores within walking distance including a small one right across the street as well as a bus stop which goes directly to the Rideau centre in about 20 minutes. The house is hardwired for high speed WIFI and ethernet service and comes fully furnished. If you’re interested, please feel free to send me a message here. Driveway parking can be arranged.

address: , Ottawa K1Y 4P8 ON, Canada
description:
Very large, beautiful, renovated condo for rent in a very desirable, central part of Ottawa

This condo boasts an inviting wood working fireplace and very large bay windows in the living room,

an oversize master bedroom with his and hers closets and a large en-suite bathrooms with jacuzzi tub,

as well as a large, newly renovated eat-in kitchen with windows.

It's a very elegant condo located in an exclusive low rise condo building, close to Dow's lake and little Italy.

The amenities include an indoor pool and a gym, a yoga room and a sauna, library, terrace, etc.

This is an exclusive building that accepts only families or people who are related to each other.

The neighborhood is quiet and friendly. It is close to parks and green space with lots of outdoors activities.

It is a short walk to the Civic Hospital, Dow's lake or Little Italy.

It is a seven minute commute to Carlton U and a ten minute commute to downtown.

It is right in front of a bus stop and next to the O-train.

Underground parking in heated garage available upon request.

Leases available to rent starting from a six months duration.

Long term leases are also available for one to five years.

Monthly rent is $3350 weather unfurnished or fully furnished and equipped.

Please call Mrs. Bota at 613-600-3153

address: 165 Clarence St, Ottawa K1N5P7 ON
description: Enjoy living on the main floor of a historic character home in the heart of Ottawa, the Byward Market. This cozy one bedroom apartment was a furnished Airbnb with all the linens and pots/pans you will need. Rent also includes all utilities (heat, hydro, A/C, water, internet/WIFI).This unique apartment is sun-filled and located on a quiet block which is a just few steps from the best restaurants, shopping, and nightlife that Ottawa has to offer. The house is centrally located and is minutes by foot to Downtown, Centretown, New Edinburgh, Lowertown, the University of Ottawa, and Sandy Hill. 	These apartments are ideal for quiet, single professionals or a couple, and are located on the ground floor with private entrances from the backyard. 	The layout is a combination living room and kitchen, with a separate bedroom and full bathroom. High ceilings have wood inlay patterns and the original 100+ year old wood floor has been restored. Rent is $1799/month and last month's rent is required. I am a great landlord with great tenants so there is an interview and application process. Parking is available for $110/month (outdoor) or $220/month (indoor), and no pets or smoking are allowed due to allergies and a central heating/cooling system.The apartment is available for Sept. 1st and this ad will be removed once the apartment is rented. Thank you!

Welcome to 1073 Hollington, part of our Arbor Village multi-complex Ottawa West residential community. Our spacious and recently renovated bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments include hardwood and ceramic flooring, new countertops, vanities, fixtures and appliances. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all seeking the convenience of city life and the comfort of home.

These apartments are in a convenient community located just two blocks from Ottawa's Central Experimental Farm acreage. The farm provides incredible green space along with paths that are great for walking or biking. At 1073 Hollington, you have easy access to a selection of public parks, grocery, shopping, dining, medical facilities, and schools. Public transportation is steps away and only a short drive to Highway 417, making your commute to work, school or nearby attractions easy and convenient.

Arbor Village is a perfect location for students given its close proximity to Carleton University and Algonquin College. Only a short distance away is the beautiful Rideau Canal where you can enjoy a stroll along the paths, take in the scenic views during a bike ride or take advantage of the green space for a relaxing afternoon in the summer.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

address: 1422 Wellington St. W, Ottawa, ON K1Y 2X2, Canada
description:
A 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo by award-winning Domicile!


This spacious and bright corner unit has 9 ft ceilings and 1,100 sq ft of living space. Huge Balcony and fabulous views north-west area of Wellington St and Gatineau Park. No obstructive view of other neighbours. Gas fireplace and Barbq hook-up connected to the unit.Open concept Living-Dining room with a large picture window framing the Gatineau park.


Sleek dark kitchen cabinetry, with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Spacious master bedroom with plenty of closet space and fantastic ensuite bath. Laundry ensuite, hardwood floors, on-site storage locker. 1 Covered parking available. Amenities include bike storage. 24-hour virtucar located in visitor parking.


Steps to Grocery stores, Westboro, Wellington Village, Parkdale market. 5min drive to Civic Hospital and Little Italy! Short stroll or bike to Hintonburg shop.


Tenant Pays: Hydro, Gas, Cable, Phone, High Speed Internet


Available Oct 1 2020 (TBD). First and last months rent required as deposit.

1-year lease required, Credit check, Referrals and rental application required. No pets, non-smoking. Serious enquires only, please email 1422Wellingtonst@gmail.com


Rent: $2400/month with Parking

Please email for more information and viewings.

Furniture have been changed, picture shows the rooms only

address: 154 Springton Cres, Nepean, ON K2J 0W1, Canada
description:
Beautiful single house for rent at a quiet crescent in Barrhaven.

154 SPRINGTON CRESCENT - ‘CHELSEA’

• Very close to Strandherd crossing (contains Metro and Shoppers drug mart)

• 3 minute drive to Riocan/Marketplace (contains Walmart, Cineplex, Loblaws, Winners, etc.)

• Single car garage.

• Quiet street.

• Spacious fenced yard with interlock done and shed included. Treat yourself with fruits from our beautiful fruit trees.

• 3 minute walk from bus stop to route 277 and 5 minute walk from bus stop to route 99 and 80.

• Beautiful maple hardwood on the first floor and carpet on the second floor.

• 3 Bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms on the second floor.

• Basement is UNFINISHED.

• Unfurnished.

• Appliances included - washer + dryer, fridge + freezer, range oven + hoodfan, dishwasher, and microwave.

• Cozy kitchen with a lot of cupboard and countertop space.

• Curtains included.

• $2,200/month

• Utilities and rental water heater not included.

Contact Logan to book a viewing - 613-277-1026 or logan7s@gmail.com

address: 401 Golden Ave, Ottawa, ON K2A 1H4, Canada
description:
Located in the heart of Westboro Village, this penthouse 2-bed/2-bath condo has an open concept layout, breathtaking views and quality finishes. Large feature windows illuminate the living room with lots of natural light. The gourmet kitchen has granite countertops, rich wood cabinetry, and stainless appliances. The spacious master bedroom features a walk-in closet and an ensuite with granite vanity and soaker tub. The main bathroom has modern finishes with a walk-in rainfall shower. Enjoy morning coffee & summer evenings barbecuing on the balcony overlooking the Ottawa River. Convenient in-unit laundry and extra storage space. Includes one indoor parking space and one private storage room. Westboro Village has become one of the most desirable places in the city to live. You will be steps away from Westboro Beach, shops, pubs, restaurants, Ottawa transit & walking/cycling paths by the Ottawa River. Available November 1st.

Video: https://clipchamp.com/watch/CMdoCww4iIZ

address: K1V7Y3, Canada
description:
Room price: $525-$575-$595

Southkey semi house for rent. Two parking lot in the driveway. Close to Smart Centre Ottawa South, 5mins walking distance to one of the biggest bus stations, with 40,90,92,93,96,97,98,197,299,304 and etc buses available. Close to Cineplex, Walmart, roots factory store, Homesense, Marshall’s, winner, loblaw and etc for just 5-10 minutes walking. It’s the perfect place to live!!!!
All rooms have basic furniture as bed, closest, desk, chair and bookshelf. If you prefer use your own furniture you can as well.
Prefer rent the whole house together but accept single room for rent as well.
Price per room will be around 500-600/month with everything included.

House rent is option with utilities or without utilities
Call or text me at 613-314-6872 if you are interested!

address: 1038 speedvale court, Kanata, ON, K2T 0P6, Canada
description:
Available between Sept 10- Oct 1st. Want to be the first one to live in this brand new 4 bedrooms end unit townhouse? https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=vAIfAagiKl0
Fantastic Location: KANATA LAKE-Arcadia, a well-established family-oriented neighborhood.
•A few minutes driving distance to highway 417, Kanata high tech companies, Kanata Centrum Shopping Centre, Tanger Outlets and Canadian Tire Sports Centre.
• Best schools in this area, high school - Earl of March boundary, Primary school-Kanata Highlands P.S., Roland Michener P.S.
• Convenient Public transit with downtown express buses etc.
Great Features:
• 4 Bedrooms, 3 bath rooms, finished basement
• Large spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom
• Stainless steel fridge, dishwasher and stove; washer, dryer, hood fan, air conditioner all included
• Finished basement with abundant sun light and storage space that can be used as recreational room or home office
Requirement:
• Tenant responsible for all the utilities and hot water tank rental.
• Rental application and credit report required. No Smoking No Grow of Cannabis or any drug related plant.
• One-year lease. First and last month rent required.
• Please contact Joanna at 613.600.8860 or joanna.jiao@esteemrealty.ca

address: 515-224 Lyon St N, Ottawa, ON K1R 0C1, Canada
description:
Located in Centre Town: Beautiful 1 bedroom, approximately 527 SQ FT + 85 SQ FT open balcony facing north. Quality modern finishes include stainless steel kitchen appliances, hardwood flooring, and exposed concrete ceiling & feature walls. Walk to Bank Street, Minto Centre, Coffee Shops, and Restaurants. Transit route nearby. It comes with one Underground parking.


Rent: $1800 plus hydro

Available: Immediate

Contact : Nantha @ 613-8509931

address: , Ottawa K1Z 8H3 ON, Canada
description:
We are offering a one bedroom apartment. It is located at Merivale and Baseline Rd. The apartment are available for Sept 1/15 occupancy.


Our one and two apartments are is approx 650ft2 and 800 ft2. It is in an older building so the apartments are larger then the new units. It has been renovated with new kitchen, bathroom, windows, and refinished hardwood flooring . The living room for the one and two bedrooms measures 12 ft by 20-22 ft, separate or combo dinning room, and the bedroom measures 15 ft by 9 ft and/or 10 ft by 9 ft. The kitchen has been renovated with the addition of new oak cabinet doors and granite countertop. The kitchen for the one bedroom available is compact, not a large kitchen. The unit has hardwood flooring throughout. Some unit also has a balcony.


The apartment is located just off Merivale Road near Baseline Road. Bus stop with express and local buses to downtown and down Merivale Road less then half a block away. Short bus ride to new LRT. Close proximity to Algonquin College at Centerpoint and Carleton university. Shopping within walking distance at Westgate mall and with easy access to the merivale shopping area at between Baseline and Hunt Club Road.


Heat and hot water are included in the rent for the one and two bedroom apartments. Tenant pays hydro for the one and two bedroom apartment. $1200/$1250 for an one bedroom unit. $1400 for a 2 bedroom.


To book a viewing, contact Marion at 613-728-7103 between the hours of 10 am and 7 pm.


Note: For the duration of the public health emergency, we will conduct the interview for the apartment rental by telephone prior to schedule the viewing appointment.

address: 515 Stonefield Private, Nepean, ON K2G 4R5, Canada
description:
Beautiful 2 bedrooms condo on the main level is located close to public transit with easy access to both sides of the building. This spacious home has 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms with inside laundry, upgraded kitchen, and Engineering hardwood. The homes include energy star stainless steel fridge, dishwasher, stove, front loader washer & dryer, and central air conditioning. It is very easy to access to public transit, shopping, and amenities.


Rent : $1800 Plus Utilities

Available : October 15, 2020

Contact : Nantha @ 613-8509931

address: 170 Lees Ave, Ottawa, ON K1S 5G5, Canada
description:
A 2BRHK apartment unit is available for renting in Rideau East Apartment @ 170 Lees Avenue, Ottawa from 3nd September, 2020 in. This unit is on 14th floor with two bed rooms, kitchen, one full wash room and a big hall having a nice river view from the window. It has a kitchen with two appliances i.e. a stove with grill oven and a refrigerator. One of the bed rooms has walk in closet and there is a common closet in the passage near wash room. It has big card operated laundry on the basement floor which is chargeable per use. Our unit type is 2B (See plan view on https://hamacanada.ca/rideau-east/ )

More importantly our lease is expiring on 31st September and will be on month to month basis from 1st October. It can be transferred and assigned upon application by interested party and will be subject to management approval. The rent is 1500 CAD$ inclusive of all for the September and 1533 CAD$ starting October 2020. Underground parking is extra.

Located besides Springhurst park with nice walking trails around. Walking distance to Ottawa U, Saint Paul University, grocery stores, coffee shops, convenient stores, banks, Lees LRT station and other bus route stops. Easy access to highway 417. All terms and conditions per building management. Please contact us directly as this advertisement is listed by us and not by the building management.

Feel free to email or call us for questions if any.

1. First moth rent 1500 CAD$, 1533 CAD$ starting October onwards.

2. Month to month lease from October 2020 with two month notice to end the lease

description:
Available October 1 - Heat, water, WiFi and snow removal included!


3 bedroom unit, top floor of a spacious bungalow on a quiet street with a large yard. Easy access to 416, 417 and highway 7, less than 10 minutes to Carling DND campus. Steps away from NCC trails for walking and biking. Parks, schools and shopping all within minutes. In-suite laundry, ensuite master bathroom, private entry and off-street parking. Pet friendly. The living room features a beautiful decorative fireplace and custom built-in shelving, tons of floor to ceiling windows letting in natural light all day! The two other moderately sized bedrooms are bright and fresh and would also make excellent office spaces. Steps away from NCC walking and biking trails, this home is a dream for those working remotely and looking to maintain an active lifestyle. Heat, water, air conditioning, WiFi, parking, snow removal all inclusive! Start living worry-free today!

address: , Gatineau J9H 2B6 QC, Canada
description:
Viewing Friday (tonight), 5:30-9:30 pm and any time tomorrow afternoon, Saturday. It’s nothing fancy but it’s comfortable. Please be respectful when you come over.


Convenient, pet friendly (dogs and cats), basement suite for rent starting September 1st.


The apartment is located in a nice, convenient, quiet area of Aylmer, Gatineau. All amenities close by such as Loblaws, Walmart, Staples, Dollarama, restaurants and more.


In walking distance you have the beautiful Ottawa river, playgrounds/water park, soccer field, Tim Hortons, gas station, mechanic and a large open field. The large open field we bring our dog to.


You would be taking over the remainder of our lease from September 1st to February 1st. This can be extended after the lease is over.


Ideal for a student or a couple starting out.


The apartment is very spacious and comes lightly furnished. Must bring your own bed. Hydro and wifi not included. We recommend the equalized payment plan as it will save you money during the winter and owe you money, if you use less (Approximately $100/month).


It does come with a stove however the current one is ours. Not sure if we will take it or not. The landlord will supply you with his own.


However, the basement suite comes with a washer/dryer, bath tub, shower/shower curtain, couch, dresser, closet, storage, storage cabinet, wifi hookup, futon and fridge. This includes one parking space. Wooden and tiled floors. Bus stop is 2 minutes away.


The parking area is shovelled and salted by one of the tenants, upstairs.


The other tenants are very quiet and respectful. We ask that you are the same. The landlord is just as easy going and laid back.


Credit cheque and employment required.


Please respond to this ad if you wish to come view it. SERIOUS INQUIRES ONLY! Thank you for your time and consideration. :)

3 Bedrooms + loft, 2.5 Baths in Immaculate condition.(total 2000 sq feet of space)

Upgraded light fixtures throughout the house along with hardwood flooring on the main level and stainless steel appliances.


Features:


9" ceiling and Hardwood floors on the main floor.


Upgraded light fixtures.


Stainless steel appliances in the kitchen.


Central A/C and humidifier.


Fire place in the living room.


Huge loft on the second floor.


Laundry on the second floor with an additional storage closet.


Master bedroom with a huge walk in closet.


Built in storage shelves in the garage and 2 tire racks.


Huge pie lot with a fully fenced backyard.

Access to Trans Canada trail.


200 meters from Black stone park and 660 meters from Rouncy park.


Included:


Utilities (Hydro+Gas+water+water heater rental).


Internet (fibe internet)+Disney plus and prime video included.


Snow removal service.


Lawn mowing and Landscaping.


parking for up to 3 cars including the garage.


Yearly Carpet cleaning.


Not Included:


Basement.

Our requirements:


No smoking


No pets


References(current employer and past 2-3 landlords)


Credit Check and background check.


Proof of Employment with last 3 months pay stubs and 2 years t4s


last month's rent required upon signing the lease and 1st month's rent 2 weeks before moving in.


Home available with minimum 12 month lease including first and last months deposit.


Serious Inquiries Only.


Please email a brief bio of yourself and we will get in touch with the next steps.

faizadrentals@gmail.com


Thank you.

Brand new 2-bedroom townhome for rent in Almonte's Mill Run community

address: 20 and 24 York Street, Ottawa, ON, K1N 1K2
description:
Key Property Details

For the finest Ottawa apartments for rent including corporate housing, furnished apartments, temporary short term housing and short term rentals, Clarendon Lanes is the place to call home.


  • York St. and Sussex Dr.: 20 and 24 York Street

  • Furnished & Unfurnished Apartments!
  • Onsite Laundry & Parking!

Property Features
  • Air Conditioning
  • Cable Ready
  • Elevator
  • Fitness Center
  • Fridge / Stove
  • Laundry Room
  • Parking
  • Pets

Detailed Property Information

Clarendon Lanes is a hidden gem, waiting to be discovered by those who appreciate comfort, style and the freedom to explore their surroundings. Choose from unfurnished or furnished apartments for rent.

Live in the heart of Ottawa's most exciting and distinguished neighbourhood, the ByWard Market, where your apartment for rent in Ottawa at Clarendon Lanes is steps from the city's best restaurants, galleries and shopping.

This modern development was completed in 2003 and offers everything you would want in a luxury apartment. Its coveted location and service-focused attitude create an inclusive neighbourhood that allows you to make the most of your days and evenings in Ottawa. Relax and unwind in the comforts of our furnished or unfurnished apartment rentals. Clarendon Lanes suites are spacious, bright, cozy and rich in architectural detail. Our suites offer you the very best in comfort and appeal with attractive granite countertops, solid maple cabinetry and central air conditioning for those warm summer nights.

In addition to unfurnished Bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom apartments for rent, we also offer short term furnished rentals. We can look after all your corporate housing, furnished apartment, temporary short term housing and short term rental needs in Ottawa.

If you're looking for something beyond the ordinary look no further than our two-storey penthouse apartments that include natural gas fireplaces for chilly Ottawa winters and a private terrace for beautiful Ottawa summers.

Unfurnished suites' rental rates do not include hydro. Furnished suites require 3 month lease. For shorter term, contact us at Sussex House.


Additional Property Information
  • Roof-top terrace
  • Controlled access
  • Underground parking
  • Fireplace (in Penthouse)
  • Granite Countertops
  • Solid Maple Cabinetry
  • Close to Restaurants
  • Close to Galleries
  • Close to Shopping
  • Close to the Parliament Buildings
  • Close to the U.S. Embassy

address: Freedom Private, Ottawa, ON K1G 6W3, Canada
description:
Great location for graduates and professionals on Smyth road and Alta Vista drive! Across the street from CHEO, Ottawa General Hospital, University of Ottawa Medical School Roger Guindon Hall, Canadian Forces Health Services Centre, MD and Canadian Blood Services. It is also steps away from trainyards with tons of shopping.


Newly renovated kitchen, bathrooms and freshly painted throughout (New photos to follow). This townhouse has a spacious open concept first floor with stainless steel appliances. There is a powder (2 piece) bathroom on the first floor. The back yard is fully fenced with deck and BBQ. The second floor figures two large bedrooms and the main bathroom. It also includes the master bedroom with its own walk-in closet and 3 piece ensuite bathroom. The basement is fully finished with washer and dryer. The townhouse has central air conditioning and heating, humidifier and air exchanger.


This townhouse is suited on a quiet street with great neighbours. There is a single car garage and two parking space in the front. Ideal tenants would be medical and graduate school professionals, hospital staff. No smoking and no pets are allowed. Security/Credit and reference check will be required. The rent is $2600/month, all utilities are extra.

address: 33 Cloverloft Ct, Stittsville, ON K2S 1T3, Canada
description:
This cheerful well-lit lower level of a duplex was recently built in an amazing location backing onto Poole Creek in Stittsville. Bright open spacious living/dining/kitchen, area with large windows which provide lots of light. This 3 bedroom home has 2 bathrooms, a large main bathroom with a tub/shower, and a washer and dryer. Master bedroom has an ensuite with a shower. The unit has a private entrance to the lower level of the home with everything on one level and is reached by only 7 steps from ground level. Backyard backs onto Poole Creek and lots of trees in the area. Separate furnace heating and ventilation for each unit. Available for September 4th. The rent is $2,150 monthly; we estimate utilities which are not included will be around $175.00. Signing bonus- the first 2 months include unlimited internet and basic Bell fibe tv.


This home is located near many amenities such as shopping, banks, schools, bus, playgrounds, parks and more. Many are within walking distance. It is located close to the Canadian Tire Centre, Tanger Outlet Mall, Bell Sensplex, Costco, Centrum, Landmark Cinemas, Signature Centre, Hazeldean Mall and more. Walking distance to public transportation, two grocery stores, and other retail.


The home is equipped with five major appliances, plus a microwave and modern kitchen cabinets. The bedrooms have closets and large windows. There are additional closets at the entry. There is exterior parking for up to 3 large cars. Exclusive use of a storage shed.


High Speed internet available from Bell and Rogers after the first 2 months at a charge.


No smoking inside please.


The installation of an electric vehicle changer is negotiable if desired as is the installation of a stair lift (7 steps) for easy access to this one floor unit.


Note unit is unfurnished. Photos are showing staging with furniture.


See a video walk through on YouTube note that the video does not do justice the unit. The rooms are larger than they appear on video.

https://youtu.be/jnug51pdvSQ


Call/text/email now.

Call 613-836-3005 and choose extension 7 to be connected with someone.

Email pbc@pbcsweetnam

Txt 613-836-3005

address: 99 Range Road, Ottawa, ON, K1N 8J6
description:
Luxury Rental in Sandy Hill! This building has it all.

HOMESTEAD LAND HOLDINGS
THE BALMORAL - 99 Range Road
613.234.6377 Call today for a tour!

One bedroom available for September or October
Starting at $2,295.00 - $2,450.00 plus electricity
Parking is $130 - $150 month

For more information regarding this property including amenities, photos and floor plans visit:
https://www.homestead.ca/apartments/the-balmoral


The Balmoral is what you've been waiting for.
It's all in the details. Every inch of your suite has been professionally designed with convenience and luxury at the forefront. Enjoy an evening of mesmerizing views on your large balcony or entertain your guests around your island kitchen. In-suite laundry provides you with convenience and central air-conditioning provides you with the comfort you expect. The sile stone countertops, LED lighting, and four stainless steel appliances give the designer kitchens vibrancy and style, while the engineered hardwood flooring helps tie the decor together, providing you with the absolute best that Ottawa has to offer in a luxury rental suite. Suite sizes range from 765-1735Square Feet.

Stunning Amenities
As you drive up to the building, you will experience the fully manicured grounds and elegant fountain, establishing the class and sophistication of the property. Enjoy a workout in one of your two exercise facilities. Spend an evening on the rooftop terrace enjoying the outstanding 360-degree views, along with barbecues. An indoor swimming pool and steam room are conveniently available, along with a luxurious fully-equipped social lounge, library, tiered theatre room, business centre, storage lockers, bicycle storage, and billiards room.

Security features have also been given much attention. Enjoy individual floor access in your touchscreen elevator, as well as controlled access to underground parking, serviced by a car-wash.
Take a stroll along the Rideau River or visit the vibrant downtown nightlife. With the bustling Byward Market and Parliament closeby, the options are endless.

address: McCurdy Dr, Ottawa, ON K2L, Canada
description: Look no further, you will fall in love with this house! This beautiful 3 bedroom + 3 bathroom single house with 2 car garage has a WALKOUT BASEMENT with NO REAR NEIGHBORS! This house is located beside McCurdy Drive in Katimavik-Hazeldean. With beautiful deck beside the kitchen, it is great for BBQ and family gathering. Both main floor and basement have gas fireplace, which makes this house warm and cozy in the winter. 5 minutes drive from all stores in Kanata Centrum Shopping Centre, 5 minutes to Tanger outlets mall. 10 minutes drive from most IT companies in Kanata or DND on Moodie Drive. OC Transpo 2 minutes away. Upstairs have two washrooms with one ensuite. One additional bathroom is on the first floor. City parks and playground are just next door. Utilities and cables are extra. The house is not furnished. Family oriented neighborhood. No smoking, no pets please. Available the end of October. 1 year lease is required. Last month deposit required for the lease. Please contact Sally @ 613-255-0258 or email if interested.

address: Athlone Ave, Ottawa, ON K1Z 5M5, Canada
description:
Hello! Please read the entire description before responding.


Looking for a young female professional to be my roommate. Move in OCT 1 OR NOV 1.


The apartment:

1 unfurnished bedroom in a spacious 1000sq. ft. furnished apartment in the heart of Westboro. Bright, big windows, hardwood floors, newly renovated bathroom and kitchen. Laundry room in basement / storage room, shared with the other two units in the house (one of which is the homeowners). Awesome, young, proactive landlords. I have lived here for three years and absolutely love the apartment and location.

*Pictures reflect two different living room layouts

**If you have an apartment sized couch or dining set that you want to bring, I may be willing to get rid of the current ones. Desk also available to keep in bedroom for studying/WFH.


Half a block up from Richmond Rd. Five minute walk from Superstore, Farmboy, LCBO, Westboro Village shops, 10 min walk to Westboro bus station. Located right by the Byron pathway, awesome for biking and walking.


$950/month includes all utilities and driveway parking spot. Rent, high speed bell internet, hydro, insurance, laundry, parking. Rent would be due on the 25th of the month, and will only change if the cost of utilities changes significantly, which would be transparently communicated with notice.


6 month contract with option to go month-to-month after.


About me:

I am a 26 year old professional who works downtown on weekdays and at a restaurant on evenings/weekends. I am an extroverted introvert - I love my quiet time at home and am okay if we keep to ourselves, but also would be more than happy to have someone to share wine and good food with! I am very athletic, love to cook, but am at home very little due to my busy work schedule. I keep the house extremely tidy and need someone who is looking to share the responsibility of cleaning and keeping the space neat. I do not have guests often, especially now with covid, and would hopefully find someone who also isn't trying to entertain too frequently. Ideal roommate is also a young female professional with a day job, someone who is friendly and respectful and financially secure.


Please reply to this post with some information about yourself and we can set up a time to meet!

Thank you,

Katie

description:
Beautiful 3 bdrm bungalow house for rent in Alta Vista neighbourhood for Oct 1st. Big front yard with large, old tree, and enormous backyard. On the main floor, the house has hardwood throughout (except kitchen), three bedrooms (all with full closets), bathroom, and a large solarium/dining room at the back of the house, with a door that leads to the backyard.

The basement is quite large as well, and has a 2nd bathroom (shower, no bathtub). The main basement room is carpeted, has a window, and is perfect for a den/rec room. There are also 4 small rooms/ storage areas off of the main basement room - tons of storage space. One of these rooms has the washer, drier and a chest freezer - all included.

There is also a single garage.

The neighborhood is full of young families and very close to the Transitway, Rideau River, Billings Bridge, and many parks and public schools. This house is perfect for a family or couple. Rent is 2050$/month, plus all utilities extra. Currently my elderly father is the tenant, and he is leaving as he is no longer able to live alone. Therefore this is a lease transfer, and any interested candidates will need to pass the landlord's credit and references check. The property is managed by an agency and they have been very helpful in doing repairs in a timely manner.

Please message me with some information about yourself, and to arrange viewing times.

address: 217 Fountainhead Drive, Ottawa K1W 0C2 ON
description:
217 Fountainhead Drive, Bradley Estates, ON K1W 0C2


This magnificent recent construction 5 bedroom home is located on a quiet street in Bradley Estates (closer to the City than Orleans) and located a block away from the Mer Bleue Conservation Area!!! Wonderful for biking, walking and running.


The foyer is extremely inviting leading into very nice flowing main floor design. This level has 9 foot ceilings with recessed LED lighting, maple hardwood flooring and ceramic tile throughout. The spacious living room is open to a formal dining room. The gourmet kitchen is spectacular!!! It has Cambria quartz countertops, an outstanding farmers sink, ample storage and counter space with a breakfast bar, and features upgraded stainless steel appliances including a fantastic 5 door fridge. Adjacent to the kitchen is the eat-in area with patio doors leading out to the backyard and the family room which has recessed lighting with a gas fireplace. The backyard is completely fenced with a multi-level deck and has a 4 season covered hot tub!!! This level also has a 2 piece powder room, and access to a double car garage.


The second floor has berber carpet throughout. There is a very large bonus room at the top of the stairs with vaulted ceilings and half moon window. The expansive master bedroom retreat has a sitting area with a second gas fireplace, a vanity area, walk-in closet and a spa-inspired 5-piece ensuite with separate shower featuring a five-way rain showerhead, a soaker tub and dual sinks. There are three additional very spacious bedrooms on this level, another full 3-piece bathroom and a laundry room.


The basement is quite outstanding and completely finished with berber carpets throughout. Wow! A sound-insulated, wired media room, pantry, a recreational room, a 5th bedroom with a large closet and another 3-piece bathroom to complete this home! The basement area provides ample storage and an extended living space or an inviting private area for guests.


Fountainhead park is just a block away, and the school zone features some of the best French and English schools in the province. This property comes with 5 appliances, central air conditioning, central vacuum, is wired for an alarm system (monitoring extra), and includes all curtain rods and sheers and select window coverings.This property is available from November 1, 2020 until July 31, 2021. No pets or smokers please.


This property is being professionally managed by Woodbridge Management Limited. For additional information and pictures please visit our website at: https://www.ottawapropertymanagement.co/ or call us at 613-236-9898.

The apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a duplex house, open concept kitchen living room.

address: 2210 Loyola Ave, Gloucester, ON K1J 7W3, Canada
description:
Single-family style living (detached building with private backyard) offered in combination with the convenience of condominium complex in the family-friendly Beach Hill North neighborhood. Only a few steps away from Centre educatif Seraphin-Marion, a sought-after French elementary school, and Colonel By Secondary school with IB program.


Three bedrooms and spacious living and dinning rooms above grade. More finished living space in the basement. Two full bathrooms.


Water, snow removal, and one parking space are included in the rent. Additional parking space may be requested from the condo management company at a low monthly fee.


Two queen size bed frames and a dinning set are available (rent is to be negotiated to include the furniture).


The unit is available immediately.

address: 335 Maclaren Street, K2P 0M5, Ottawa, ON
description:
Available Now

1 Bedroom Apt in Centretown

335 Maclaren Street


$1500 all utilities included (heat/water/hydro)


The building is pet friendly, quiet, and located right by Bank St on Maclaren. Grocery store is a 2 minute walk. You're no more than a 10 minute walk from anything you might need - stores, library, gym etc. It's 15 mins to Parliament. Lots of buses nearby, as well as the Virtucar lot.


This is the top floor and a corner unit, so fewer neighbours. It's also south facing, so lots of natural light. Great views of sun rise from the balcony.


Parking is available; $130 overground and $180 underground.


Comes unfurnished, but a double bed and desk are available. I've loved living in this apartment for the last two years, and am only leaving because I'm moving province.

Address: 238 Besserer, Ottawa, Ontario. K1N 6B1

500 metres (0.3 mile) to Ottawa Convention Center.

****************************************************************

Hello all, Bonjour à vous, Hola,

Welcome to my luxury condo with air-conditioned and heated underground parking (+ 175$/month). It has 600 sq. feet. The condo faces east so plenty of sunlight. Pool, sauna, BBQ, gym, rooms’ access is included. The condo has 1 bedroom ( 1 QUEEN) size bed with 1 full bathrooms and all the appliances including free usage of washing machine & dryer in the condo; you even don’t need to go outside to do your laundry. Plus, your own balcony is included.

To complement the comfort and all the furniture in place, my condo offers the following attributes:

•LOCATION. The condo is located in the HEART of DOWNTOWN meaning you are BESIDE or VERY close to everything.

•From the Ottawa MacDonald-Cartier AIRPORT, it is a 20 minutes drive (15km or 9 miles) with a car or a taxi Or, the public transit express bus # 97, and in 35 minutes, it will bring you to downtown, and from there, you are less than 5 minutes WALK to my condo.

•From the condo, it is a 5 minute WALK to everything like the famous By-Market, The Canal Rideau, the Parliament Hill, Rideau Centre (for shopping mall), Ottawa University, government buildings, and many more.

• Grocery stores (Metro and Loblaws open 24h/24), liquor & beer store -LCBO- , Bus & Transitway, Ottawa Little Theatre, pharmacy, boutique, restaurants, coffee shop, bar & terrace, cinema, bookstores are less than 1 minute WALK.

•MUSEUMS – GALLERIES at walkable distance (5-20 minutes) to most of Ottawa’s big museums.

•OTTAWA CONVENTION CENTER within 5 minutes WALK or 500 meters (0.3 mile).

•Please contact me if you want further details.

And welcome to Ottawa!

description:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options. 

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to 235 Charlotte located in the heart of Sandy Hill, one of Ottawa's trendiest neighbourhoods! Not only will you be living in comfort at this newly renovated neo-Victorian styled building, but you are steps away from the most exciting amenities around town. This location is ideal because of the clean and upscale heritage-style bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom apartments. 

Located in Sandy Hill, right along the banks of the historic and beautiful Rideau River, this peaceful location has been discovered by students and young professionals. 235 Charlotte is a convenient walk to the internationally-acclaimed University of Ottawa, and the ByWard Market. Museums, cafes, and boutiques are all a part of what makes the ByWard Market a trendy destination. The market's restaurants, pubs and nightclubs provide a variety of international cuisine, social excitement and late night dancing and music.

address: 1040 Hollington Street, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 8C5
description:
Open House Hours:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options. 

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to 1030-1040 Hollington, offering modern home comforts in a ideal Ottawa West neighbourhood. This building offers spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments, which include hardwood and ceramic flooring, along with new vanities and fixtures. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all looking for the convenience of city life with the comforts of home.

Arbor Village is located along the edges of Ottawa's scenic Experimental Farm. Residents at Hollington can enjoy the farm's exceptional gardens, as well as the walking and biking trails. It's convenient location to Ottawa's popular Carling Ave and Merivale Rd is ideal due to the numerous public parks, shopping options, restaurants, grocery stores, medical facilities and schools. Nearby public transportation and Highway 417 make commuting to work or school easy.

A beautiful walk or short drive can take you to the Rideau Canal, where you will find scenic views and trails, as well as a selection of restaurants. Students are attracted to the village's close proximity to the acclaimed Carleton University and Algonquin College.

  • Westgate Shopping Centre

address: 255 York St, Ottawa, ON K1N 5T9, Canada
description:
ABOUT THE NEW YORK

Designed for:


An individual seeking design that intersects with minimalism.


Keeping life simple and uncluttered by adhering to the bare essentials. THE NEW YORK is influenced by Japanese aesthetics evolved around clean and uncluttered living, holding tightly to balance, and a love of sharp lines and symmetry.


​


From the hallways to our exterior, THE NEW YORK will evoke feelings of tranquility, calmness and peace.


​


While being located in the heart of downtown Ottawa, THE NEW YORK encompasses a residential and family filled neighborhood.


​


Inclusive living:


All utilities are included.


(AC/Heat/Water/Hydro/1G Internet)


​


All you need to do is show up with your luggage.


​


We have also fully furnished your apartment with new Tom Dixon furniture, LIFX Beams and Bulbs, 55' Android TV, fully equipped kitchen, bath towels, linens, duvet, pillows, art work.

address: K1S2H8, Canada
description: Nestled in the heart of the Glebe, 211 Second avenue is a sought after location by many. Mature gardens and trees welcome you home. With a walk score of 94 you get the best of both worlds, a quiet home in the middle of so many amenities. address: Baskins Beach Rd, Ottawa, ON K0A 1T0, Canada
description:
Looking for Family, Working Professionals or Retirees to occupy my home on the Ottawa River. Available November 1st for minimum 6 month lease. Available furnished or unfurnished.


Located at the end of a private cul-de-sac in a rural residential neighbourhood, this home boasts floor to ceiling windows and waterviews throughout. Add vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams, crystal chandeliers, exposed brick, a 3 season sunroom and a dual-sided wood burning fireplace and you've got your summer retreat as well as winter chalet all in one! Just 15 minutes from Kanata, this private waterfront property has everything you need to work from home all while being accessible for a night out in the city. Highspeed internet and views of the Gatineau Hills.


Top of the line extra large LG laundry machines complete with steam function, extra large garage with additional workshop space, master bedroom with two walk-in closets and an ensuite. Shared laundry, hottub and pool table are located on owner-occupied lower level walkout with additional wood burning fireplace, a large exposed brick bedroom, full bath and two rec rooms with waterviews and private entrance. Potential to rent entire home. Pet friendly but deposit required.


This property is highly sought after in the neighbourhood of Dunrobin Shores and will not last long! Contact to book your viewing today. Must provide proof of good credit, stable income and references. Applications taken until September 20th.

address: 255 Bay St, Ottawa, ON K1R 0C5, Canada
description:
Elegant FURNISHED Condo 2 bed 2 bath - The Bowery Condos & Lofts – Downtown Ottawa 255 Bay St. Available as of Mid September 2020 - $2295.00 per month


Fabulous location! The sophisticated condominium at 255 Bay St. is gem nestled on the edge of downtown Ottawa. Best suited for professionals, or couples looking for furnished accommodation while working in Ottawa on contract or other business in the Ottawa area.


This lovely suite is available on a one-year contract term from mid September. Six-month term may be offered with an adjusted base rent price.

This building is exceptionally well maintained in a very clean condition, and has state of the art entry/access systems. The rooftop amenities are located on the 18th floor, inviting you to soak up the sun, socialize, swim, tan, party and work out in style.


The 781 Sq. Ft. apartment is located on the south west corner of the building, providing for additional window space and views of the city from a 52 Sq. Ft balcony. The apartment is furnished with a European flavor. The living/dining/kitchen open space is bright and sunny, with hardwood floors through out.


The kitchen equipped with a stove, dishwasher, fridge, microwave, basic cooking and dining equipment and utensils, and plenty of cupboard space. All cabinets in the kitchen and bathrooms are dark wood with White quartz counter tops.


The master bedroom has its own en-suite with walk-shower, and the in-suite laundry, is located in the main bathroom.


Enjoy some quiet time, sunsets and BBQ’s on your west facing balcony surrounded by mature trees and a lovey view. (Electric bbq’s only). Or hang out in the Roof top gardens on the 18th floor

.

The location provides an easy stroll to dining and shopping, and everything the city has to offer. It is only minutes from the Queensway (417) for auto travel and the Ottawa River Valley Parkway for biking and recreational activities.


Rent $2295.00 per month, plus hydro or $2345.00 all inclusive

The suite comes with a storage locker, parking is not included, however a parking space may be rented from other tenants for $100-$150.00 a month.


Please contact Mary for a showing: Phone 613-702-4447 (closed after 6pm and Sundays) or reply to this AD by email.

NON SMOKERS and NO PETS only.

Credit check, References and last months’ rent will be required.

description:
222 Russell Ave is located in Sandy Hill, close to the University of Ottawa, Rideau Center and the Byward Market. It is also near downtown Ottawa, Lowertown and various grocery/shopping locations. This 2-storey condo has been recently renovated and features ample storage, stone countertops, towel heater in the main bathroom and top of the line appliances. The balcony affords a view of the tree-filled park behind the house, offering a slice of nature and privacy with a downtown location. There is one designated parking spot around the back of the building, a large storage area in the basement and a secure video intercom to screen visitors. The building backs on to a large park area, there is a community pool and park nearby so the location is great for families. Don’t let the location fool you: this building and all the tenants are extremely quiet !


- 3 bedroom (1 master with walk in closet, 2 med-size rooms with double door closets), 1.5 bath

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Situated in the central west end of Ottawa and in walking distance to the beach, Britannia Parkside offers everything you desire. From updated kitchens and bathrooms, refinished hardwood floors, upgraded common areas and a fresh exterior to the convenience of nearby amenities, you will be proud to call Britannia Parkside your new home!

OTTAWA WEST APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Britannia Beach neighbourhood, Britannia Parkside offers newly updated bachelor apartments, one bedroom apartments, two bedroom apartments and three bedroom apartments. Our residents can enjoy scenic views of the Ottawa River and Gatineau Hills from their doorsteps, walk over to Britannia Beach for a relaxing day under the sun, or take a stroll on the extensive biking and hiking trails just steps away.

Our excellent Britannia Beach neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Bayshore Shopping Centre, Coliseum Movie Theatre, Farm Boy and more popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Whatever your desire is, Britannia Parkside is the perfect place to call home!

address: 40 Marlowe Crescent, Ottawa, ON K1S 1H4, Canada
description:
2-bedroom detached house in Old Ottawa East: between Main street and Rideau River, across the canal from Glebe, 2km from downtown. Quiet family neighborhood with nice large park, children’s playground, tennis and basketball courts and even two docks for kayaking on Rideau River and Rideau Canal – all within 500 meters or less from the house. You can bike, skate (in the winter) or even walk to downtown (although walking may take about 30 minutes).


The house has 2 bedrooms and a bathroom on the second floor, eat-in kitchen and living and dining rooms on the first floor. Partially finished basement has an additional recreational room and office nook. Central A/C, all appliances and a functional fireplace. Large fenced backyard with a deck. Ideal for a small family, a couple, or for a single person who wants extra space and privacy close to the city center.


Please, check the youtube video for the tour of the house and the neighborhood. This video consists of three parts. The first part (5min 31 sec) is the tour of the house. The second part (5:11-11:16) is the walk from the house to the Brantwood park and Rideau River as well as the views there. The third part (from 11:16 till the end of the video) is the walk from the house to Main street, St. Paul University and Rideau Canal. The second and third parts may be boring since about half of them are just a walk on the street, but I wanted to show you how close everything is.


Please note that all photos and video were made 3 years ago - some walls may be painted in different colours and the furniture in the house (that belongs to current tenant) is different. Also, a new pedestrian bridge across the canal has being build since the video has being recorded.


Available starting November 1st. 24 hour notice required to view the house. Rent is $2,100 + utilities

address: 926 Rue Principale, Saint-Paul-d'Abbotsford, QC J0E 1A0, Canada
description:
The cottage for rent is a Swiss Chalet style of country house made of wood and stone located at the foot of Mount Yamaska on a parcel of land that includes a natural reserve.


This naturally bright country house with its porches and windows on all four sides offers a spectacular view of the property and its natural beauty. With the house being about three hundred feet from the highway, this property is very private around the house and pool areas, especially from May to October, when distant neighbours cannot be seen or heard.


The property is located in the municipality of Saint-Paul-d'Abbostford in the heart of Québec's Montérégie region. The villégiature atmosphere and fertile soils of the St-Paul area have attracted cultivators and artisans alike. The area is known for producing quality apples, maple syrup and wine.


Ideally located this beautiful property is:


- About 10 kilometers from Granby and its big stores

- About 40 minutes from the Champlain Bridge in Montreal

- About 13 minutes from exit 55 on Autoroute 10

- Half way between Montréal and Sherbrooke

- About 30 minutes from Bromont ski hill.

- About 50 minutes from Sutton ski hill

- About 50 minutes from villégiature towns of Knowlton and Sutton

- About 7 minutes from the village of St-Paul-d'Abbotsford

- About 1 hour from U.S. border (Vermont and New York)


A big portion of the property has been declared a natural reserve. Dan and I are proud owners of this property and we will not only be the owners of the natural reserve but also its keepers and protectors.


This property is ideal for people who love nature or want a country house for the weekends.


Come and discover this little piece of paradise at the foot of Mont Yamaska.


Available weekends and weekly all year.


Sleeps 6 adults and 3 children


Perfect as a base for tourist and events such as:


- Granby Zoo

- Soccer/ hockey tournaments

- Bromont skiing/water slides

- Wineries

- Apples

- Ski Sutton

- business meetings / retreats


For more information on the property, visit our website:

http://swiffy-j.com/gamine/

description:

· 1,850 sq. ft. with 2 separate entrances
· Common access garage entryway/mudroom with coat closet, powder room and ample storage space

· Cozy wood pellet fireplace
· Open concept kitchen/dinette with stainless steel dishwasher, stove and fridge

· 2 spacious bedrooms with new LED light fixtures; 1 with good-sized closet and 1 with large his/her walk-in closet

This home is ideal for professionals who enjoy an active lifestyle, are hard working, motivated, clean, easy-going, and fun. There is absolutely zero tolerance for hard partying or drugs.

· First and last months rent required

address: 219 Cobourg St, Ottawa, ON K1N 8H9, Canada
description:
A beautiful Victorian home in the heart of city, yet set in a quiet area, with large outdoor lawn and deck, parking, and in unit laundry.

On Cobourg Street in Sandy Hill, the apartment is on the main floor of a charming Victorian Era Home in one of Ottawa’s Embassy districts. It is a short walk to all the main attractions like Parliament Hill, the Rideau Centre and the Byward Market. Built in the 1890’s the home has been completely renovated and offers all modern amenities and appliances, while still maintaining its old world feel.

The home is spacious with stunning bay windows and a lot of natural light. The apartment is within a fourplex, and some furniture is available for sale. The laundry unit is in the basement and shared with the downstairs unit tenant. Outdoor garage and basement is available for storage.

Rent includes:

- all utilities

- laundry

Not Included:

- Wi-Fi, cable

- Parking ($50/spot)

address: Madden Ct, Nepean, ON K2J 4L9, Canada
description:
Available for September 1st or 15th. The sooner the better but my priority is finding a compatible housemate.


Full-Time working male (60+ hours/week) seeking housemate to share 3 bedroom furnished* town house.

Available for August 1st, August 15th, or September 1st. Earliest date preferred.


* New coffee/end tables are ordered, waiting on delivery. You will need your own bedroom furnishings but there is an available queen size bed in the spare room that could be used temporarily.


Female preferred (cats are anxious around other males and I've always had a positive experience with female housemates, previous tenants will provide a recommendation if required). Although it is a 3 bedroom town house I am only interested in ONE adult to share the house with. You will have full access to the entire house, this is not a room-for-rent. My current housemate is moving out only to be closer to her family/work and she will provide a personal reference if required. I am very clean and keep to myself. There are also 2 cats that live with me or I guess you could say that I live with them! Due to this, the ad is listed as pet friendly but one additional cat would be the absolute maximum.


Please note: I will not be accepting the first qualified applicant and will be very thorough and selective with my decision. I feel it is very important to find someone compatible when it comes to sharing a house.

I am listing the rental amount at $630/month. This amount includes High Speed Internet (with Netflix!) and House Insurance (mandated by the landlord) but does NOT include Gas (Enbridge), Hydro (Ottawa Hydro), or Parking (if required). Hydro and Gas would be split 50/50 (estimates below). Outdoor parking is also available from the landlord (not me) at an additional rate of $45/month (it's actually $44/month until December).


Rental Breakdown (Estimated Bills)

Base Rent: $630

Enbridge Gas: $40-$70/month (split 50/50 = $20-$35 each)

Ottawa Hydro: $40-$70/month (split 50/50 = $20-$35 each)

• These amounts are estimates only and averages based off the previous year. This is to give you an annual estimate only. Some months may be much higher, some months may be much lower (heating in the winter, over all hot water usage, a/c units, laundry volume, etc). Your estimated monthly average would be in the $670 to $700/month range (+$45 if parking is required).


Only my name would be on the physical lease and utility bills but we would be signing both a Roomers and Boarders Agreement, along with a Roommate Agreement. I will provide signed receipts for rent and bills. I'm interested in a minimum of 1 year (longer preferred but not required) with month-to-month afterwards unless we agree to commit to another year. 60 days notice must be provided by either of us in order to terminate the tenancy agreement. Last month's rent (not including bills) will be required upon signing the agreement and first month's rent will be due upon move-in date (pro-rated daily if you move in mid-month).


House details;

• 3 Bedroom

• 2 Entrances

• 1.5 Bath (1 Full large bathroom upstairs + 1 toilet/sink downstairs)

• 90% furnished.

• Fridge, Stove, Microwave, Washer/Dryer (new).

• no dishwasher

description:
$100 rebate per month for the 1st 12 months.

Available early September, enjoy the luxury of your new home in Claridge Tribeca East (Centretown) built in 2015. 26th floor, 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom (1 ensuite) 955 sq. ft. apartment with 6 appliances, open kitchen with living and dining area and small balcony. Beautiful unobstructed southern view! Ensuite laundry, stainless steel appliances. Bedrooms at opposite ends of the apartment for additional privacy. Master with ensuite bathroom. Conveniently located within walking distance of fine dining, shopping and public transportation. Steps away from Farm Boy grocery store and Rexall Pharmacy right outside the building, Elgin Street, Parliament Hill, the Rideau Canal, National Arts Centre, Rideau Centre shopping, Byward Market and more. Exceptional building amenities include bicycle storage, large roof top terrace overlooking Parliament Hill and the Peace Tower, 2 guest suites and 3 conference rooms for resident use, party room, 24 hour security and concierge at the reception desk, 3 high speed elevators, storage locker. 2nd floor amenities include a fitness centre, change rooms, indoor lap pool, childrens splash pad and 7,000 sq. ft. outdoor terrace, with bbqs off the party room and roof top terrace. No smoking, no parking included but may be possible to arrange privately . $2400 + hydro (OFFERS BEING ACCEPTED ACCOMPANIED BY COMPLETED APPLICATIONS AND PROOF OF INCOME) Note that the monthly rent is $2500 per month with $100 rebate for each of the 1st 12 months. After the first year, the monthly rebate will be discontinued.

To arrange an in person viewing, please note visits are limited to 2 people per appointment and you must be wearing a mask.

address: 38 Granton Avenue, Ottawa, ON, K2G 1W8
description:
Available immediately. Gorgeous executive home. Stunning, custom built, 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom single family home located close to Merivale and Baseline Roads. Excellent shopping nearby and convenient public transit access, schools, medical offices, restaurants, hospitals, etc. Convenient inside entry to mudroom and basement from the double insulated garage with separate furnace. Double car garage with space for 4 extra vehicles on laneway. Gleaming hardwood and tile throughout. Sparkling clean, bright and move in ready! Eat in kitchen boasts walnut accent cabinetry, high end features and appliances; including built in Miele coffee machine, high end stainless steel gas stove with double oven and grill, built in fridge and dishwasher. Large main floor family room with built ins and cozy gas fireplace. Comfortably sized formal living room. Master bedroom with double sided fireplace with marble surround, custom walk in closet and 5 piece luxury ensuite with luxury, separate steam shower. Custom draperies, tracks and blinds throughout as well as top lighting designs. Fully finished lower level with large rec-room, laundry and exercise area.Separate access to garage. Fenced rear yard with large deck. Built in underground sprinkler system to assist with landscaping care. A must see! Minimum lease term 12 months, no smoking. $5900 per month plus utilities.

Downtown turn-key Studio condo, lease September 1 to February 28, 2021 or longer.

Just bring your suitcase, your phone, your linens to enjoy carefree living.

The comforts of home with the conveniences of a hotel. (Corporate clients welcome.)

Walk to the Glebe, the canal or Parliament in minutes. Adjacent to Museum of Nature.

Parking available from building management (Park Safe) for a fee. (Surface or underground garage.)

Hydro, a/c, heat, hot water included. Also included: bi-weekly cleaning service and unlimited Fibe internet and tv.

address: Chemin Sarrasin, Val-des-Monts, QC J8N 2M2, Canada
description:
Enjoy this cozy 1,200-square-foot rustic cabin during the fall and winter months from September 1st 2020 to May 15th 2021.


***Min 6 months


Only 45 minutes from downtown Ottawa and within 20 minutes of Wakefield and all 3 ski hills: Mont Cascade / Edelweiss / Camp Fortune.


Situated directly on beautiful lake St-Pierre de Wakefield this secluded cabin accommodates a family of four.


Ottawa Canada.–based Storm Architecture by cdrg+RedTeam designed and built the cabin using only the simplest of materials—wood timber frame construction with beautiful BC fur—to enclose a modest 1,200 square feet.


The cabin provides an escape with a remarkable sense of place created through sophisticated spatial and compositional means.


The cabin situated atop a granite bluff to create an idyllic retreat. Imagine a natural, rustic cabin with all the modern amenities of a modern custom home that fits the lay of the land and the outdoors-oriented lifestyle.


Timber Frame Hybrid endure as ideal expressions of the harmony that can be achieved between mankind and nature. With walls of wood in its almost natural form, they bring us intimately closer to our surroundings.


A new twist on an timber frame design, this cabin has a traditional gabled roof with the modern addition of two other porch roofs on either side of the structure.


*** wood stove, in floor radiant heating
