description:
1405.26 a month Move in September 6 (may take 2-3 weeks to get your application approved by management)


A lovely 2 bedroom apartment with 2 washrooms (one shower, one tab) and a nicely sized living room. (One of them is a master bedroom)


Large long closet through the entire hallway.


The living room has a large window covering a whole wall, exit to to a balcony and a side dinning room connected to it. There is plenty of light in the apartment so you can save on electricity. There is also really good sound isolation in case you have instruments.


The building includes a large lobby with a code to get into the building, two elevators and washing machines in the basement. There is also a Laundromart right outside the apartment.


A bus stop in front of the building with easy one bus connections to the train, Bayshore and St. Laurant mall as well as more options to universities and nearby schools.


The plaza in front of the building contains the Elmvale mall, many food locations, a grocery store, Dollar store and more. There are also more places including middle east grocery store just a walking distance away.


Behind the building there is technology museum with a nice park area in the front.

A bonus of great views of the sky due to it being the 5th floor and having nothing taller than two stories anywhere nearby. :)


Parking lot behind the house as well as a free one in the plaza infront.

description:

COVID-19 - Due to current pandemic we will be doing a lot of screening via email, therefor please tell us a bit about yourself when expressing interest in the rental. Also, need to see proof of current employment.


Clean, spacious and secure. Lots of privacy!


Located in a wonderful community just 10 minutes from the Queensway (417). Tranquil rural living in a urban area (2.5 acres). Main crossroads are March Rd and Second Line. 5 minute drive to groceries (Sobeys/Metro), restaurants/take out (Lone Star, Barley Moe, Royal Oak, Lucky Dragon), banks, pharmacy, gas stations and more. 5 minutes from hi tech industry (Alcatel) No immediate bus routes, would need a vehicle to live here.


Price is all inclusive ($960). Includes a massive carpeted bedroom with 2 large windows, private full bathroom, living room, private full kitchen, heat/hydro, cable/internet, parking space for one (1) vehicle, access to laundry, pool table and gym.


Also included, our monthly cleaning service will clean your bathroom, mop your kitchen floor and vacuum the hallway. No bedroom service.


Large bedroom comes fully furnished and includes a queen bed, dresser, end tables, desk/table chairs, 40 " color tv. Freshly painted last year, carpets cleaned and new insulation added to the ceiling.


Kitchen is also fully furnished, minus the full oven/dishwasher. Includes full fridge, convection oven, microwave, hot plate/elements, dishes, cutlery, pots, glasses, small appliances and more.


Parking space (for 1 vehicle) and driveway is plowed in the winter. Motion detector light at front entrance facilitates a safe and easy entry at night. We love animals, but no pets please.


References required and a police check is mandatory. A simple and timely process.


Looking for a clean, quiet, non smoking individual (space is for 1 person only). Not a party place. Landlords live upstairs so easily accessible if you have maintenance requirements. Our space is separated by a locked door and your bedroom door also has a lock for added privacy.We are a very welcoming family and will go the extra mile to ensure you are well taken care of.

address: 197  Cumberland Street, Ottawa, ON, K1N 5G5
description:
Open House Hours:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options. 

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Welcome to 197 Cumberland, where not only can you relax in affordable style, but you are a short walk away from the most dynamic section of downtown Ottawa, the ByWard Market. Ideal for university students and young professionals, at the pet friendly 197 Cumberland we offer clean and upscale bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments.

197 Cumberland is located in the bustling ByWard Market/Lowertown neighbourhood of downtown Ottawa. Tucked away in a secluded and quiet neighborhood just a few blocks from the heart of the ByWard Market, residents can enjoy the nearby Ottawa River, University of Ottawa, Rideau Centre and a variety of shops, restaurants and entertainment.

Come visit us at 197 Cumberland and you'll discover how enticing downtown life can be.

What's Nearby:

  • ByWard Market
  • National Gallery of Canada
  • Elizabeth Bruyere Hospital
  • OC Transpo
  • University of Ottawa
  • Rideau Centre
  • Royal Ottawa Hospital

Property Amenities

  • Parking
  • 24 Hour Emergency Service
  • Fitness Centre
  • Secure Entrance

Suite Amenities
  • Pet Friendly
  • Freshly Painted
  • Fridge and Stove

*E&OE. Pricing subject to change and finishing may vary, contact Customer Care Coordinator for more info.

address: 429 Somerset St W, Ottawa, ON K2P 2P5, Canada
description:
OVERVIEW


This studio is ready to go, set up with all your basic needs!


It has a generous galley eat-in kitchen, private outdoor patio, outdoor terrace that is shared with other tenants, along with natural gas BBQs, and a spacious bathroom!


IMPORTANT COVID DETAILS


The apartment is COVID-safe: it is conveniently located on the second floor of the building, with a staircase in and out via a side entrance, limiting, for all intents and purposes, any direct contact with other residents. In addition, the heating and ventilation system is localized within the unit, limiting the circulation of air between units.


DETAILS


The 600 sq feet offers a combined, large sleeping and living area, eat-in kitchen, spacious bathroom with tub, and your own, private laundry room with a dryer and washer, along with plenty of closet space in the front corridor.


We have fully furnished the entire apartment, and it comes with brand new Bosch washer and dryer, built-in closet with separate laundry, high-speed internet, air con, a brand new Bosch washer and dryer, plenty of towels and linens, Keurig coffee maker, silverware, stemware, and crockery to make sure you are as comfortable as can be!


The inside is not all this apartment has to offer, though. There’s also a private patio with a cafe-style table for eating outside when the weather’s good. We have lovely table clothes and linens to accompany your outdoor eating.


INCLUSIONS


Pretty much everything you could want!

•	Heating and A/C

•	Hot water

•	Washer/drier

•	Full-size fridge

•	Full-size stove

•	Keurig coffee maker

•	Toaster

•	Brita water filter

•	Flat-screen TV

•	Microwave

•	Towels and linens

•	Glassware, flatware, and plates

•	Pots, pans and cooking utinsels

•	Bodum press and teapot

•	Vacuum

•	Cleaning implements and mop

•	Fire extinguisher

•	First aid kit

•	And even more!


SHARED SPACES


It’s not only the apartment, though; as a tenant of 429 Somerset, you’ll have access to the building’s outdoor terrace that has free, natural gas BBQs, secured bike storage, and a party room that can be booked for your parties and get togethers.


THE HOOD


Centretown is a great neighbourhood, with everything that you need at your fingertips! It has a vibrant, multicultural feel to it, and you can easily get to all that Ottawa has to offer, including the University of Ottawa (20 minutes on foot), the Parliament Buildings (15 minutes on foot), Byward Market (25 minutes on foot), and many other attractions!


There are also plenty of coffee shops, great restaurants, and the vibrant scene along Bank Street. You’re also only a hop, skip, and a jump away from China Town and Little Italy.


GETTING AROUND


The apartment is right near a major transit link on Bank St. Busses run along the street that link of up Ottawa’s transport network. Taking the bus is easy, and getting to and from the apartment is also pretty easy on bike or foot.


The building also offers parking for visitors, and there is a car rental just across the street, so you can pick up a car there and explore all that Ottawa and its environs has to offer.


IMPORTANT NOTES


•	Neither pets nor smoking is permitted in the apartment

•	Minimum stay is six months

•	Apartment is available Oct 1

description:
Very large 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom unit over two levels.


Beautifully restored and renovated in 2020, a historic family home on a quiet street, conveniently located steps away from the Royal Canadian Mint, multiple embassies, University of Ottawa, Rideau Centre and public transit.

Modern spacious kitchen, comfortable living area, dining room, full bathroom, and bedroom on main floor, A/C, radiant heating. The second floor features a second bedroom, along with a full bathroom including a standup shower and large cast iron soaker tub.

Parking.

Large backyard with trees.


Historic touch: One of the first houses built in Ottawa (Bytown at the time) in 1884. Originally built as a log home with later added spaces, rooms, and levels. During the recent restorations many original features have been discovered and integrated in the current design.

Plus $200 including all utilities, one parking spot, and unlimited high speed WiFi. Second parking spot is possible.

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

Welcome to 1196 Shillington, part of our Arbor Village multi-complex Ottawa West residential community. Our recently renovated 1 bedroom apartments include hardwood and ceramic flooring, updated countertops, vanities, fixtures and appliances. These suites are ideal for students, couples, young professionals and retirees who are looking for a quiet place to call home with easy access to amenities and attractions..

1196 Shillington is steps from Ottawa's Experimental Farm where you can enjoy beautiful gardens, paths and more. The building's close proximity to Carling Ave and Merivale Rd provides for access to numerous public parks, shopping, grocery, medical facilities and schools. Highway 417 is a short drive away and public transportation is just steps from your front door.

The Rideau Canal is a beautiful walk or short drive away where you can find waterside restaurants and cafes. 1196 Shillington is conveniently located between Carleton University and Algonquin College, great for students looking for a quick and easy commute to campus.

WHO IS THÉO?

Apartments

address: 199  Slater Street, Ottawa, ON, K1P 0C8
description:
Comfortable, furnished one bedroom studio on the 21th floor of the well-located 199 Slater condo building. The building This gorgeous building with its striking, mid-century modern look combines condo apartments with the sought-after Alt Hotel and its street-level bar and high-end foodie take-out. The condo features a 5th floor outdoor terrace with downtown views, and the condo's amenities include a gym, a theatre room, a banquet room and lounge, an outdoor summer hot tub, and a billiards room. It has clean, carpeted hallways and two fast, big elevators. The apartment This apartment is a condominium unit (not a hotel suite) located high above the street on the 21floor. It has a wide south view, a decent-sized bedroom, two closets, nice big windows, a nice bathroom with glass-enclosed shower, and comes fully equipped with washer-dryer, microwave, fridge, stove, and dishwasher, plus bike parking and storage locker. It is tastefully painted, decorated, and well-furnished with a double bed, table and chairs, couch, practical living room furniture including a fold-up coffee table, flat screen TV, and fully equipped (kitchenware, pots and pans, linens, coffee maker, kettle, iron and ironing board, good curtains). The apartment is perfect for a single person or a couple. The location If you've always wanted or need to be downtown, this is a great place to be. The condo is steps away from Bank and Sparks Streets. Within your block, there is a Starbucks, a bubble tea place, a bookstore, a sushi place, a Bridgehead, a Think Lunch, a Caribbean eatery and a Tim Horton. Within the next block you have a Shoppers Drug Mart, Eggspectation Restaurant for brunch, the Royal Oak pub, the Blurry Pixel, a bakery with good bread and croissants, and the World Exchange Plaza. You are within a few blocks of two grocery stores (Sobeys [with beer] and Massine's Independent Grocer), two LCBO's, restaurants, shops of all kinds, bars and clubs, and much much more. And within a 12-minute walk, you have the Byward Market, Rideau Street, Rideau Centre, University of Ottawa, DND, the NAC, and all of downtown. Transport The building is steps away from the subway (Parliament Station, to open November 2018). Frequent bus service on Bank Street (OC Transpo) and Wellington Street (OC Transpo and STO). Bank Street Transitway Station across the street (until the subway opens). If you have a car, parking may be rented separately or nearby. Rent Your rent includes everything: internet, hydro, heat, water. You only pay the rent: $1,800 /month. Non-smokers, no pets. References required, first and last month rent deposit upon signing. Minimum 1 Year.



Building Overview

Downtown lifestyle in the luxurious Slater condo building.Furnished Studio21stfloor of the new luxury building the slater. Brand new stainless steel appliances and quartz counter tops. Building amenities include a party room, gym, games room, theatre room and hot tub. Locker included and no parking with this unit.

1-year lease

$1700.00 +Hydro.

The Slater offers residents the opportunity to live, work and play right in their own back yard. Located in the heart of downtown Ottawa, in the thriving Business District, and just a few blocks from the Parliamentary Precinct and Parliament Hill, The Slater is also within short walking distance of great shopping destinations, including the Rideau Centre and Ottawa's renowned ByWard Market.

address: , Ottawa K1Z 5V3 ON, Canada
description:
*Please read everything below before messaging :) I know this is a long ad, but I’ve taken the time to include as many details as possible for those interested. Feel free to message if you have additional questions!*


I am a 30 year-old professional female looking for a roommate for the apartment I am currently in. Full-time professional non-smoking females only please. The room will be available as of this fall. Let me know when you were looking to move, I’m relatively flexible.


THE ROOM, LOCATION, ETC:


One bedroom available in a two bedroom apartment in Westboro (near the Superstore, Richmond Rd/Kirkwood area).


The photos of the room with furniture are from a previous roommate just to show scale, however my current roommate might be willing to leave/sell some of her furniture, and this could be discussed if you're interested.


- The room is fairly large measuring in at 11’11” x 11’2” with a large window and large closet

- The unit is on the main floor of a triplex

- The unit has one shared bathroom, with a brand new Bath Fitter being installed soon!

- Street parking only, or if you wanted, there is a paid underground lot nearby (5 minute walk). There is no parking space available for you on the premises since I occupy the only space for the unit.

- Ideal for either someone who doesn't drive, OR works ~9-5 type of hours in order to avoid bylaw tickets during the weekdays (bylaw doesn’t patrol our street on weekends)

- 5 minute walk to Westboro bus station (OC Transpo) which connects to LRT

- 2 minute walk to Superstore

- 5 minute walk to Farm Boy

- 3 minute drive to the highway on/off ramps

- Not a far walk or drive to Wellington West (Wellington Village), Hintonburg, Tunney’s Pasture, even downtown is a quick drive down Scott Street, the parkway, Richmond Rd, or the highway

- Air conditioning (central air)!

- Hardwood floors throughout

- Stainless steel kitchen appliances (dishwasher, fridge, stove)

- Nice natural light

- Coin-operated laundry in basement of building

- There is no storage available in or outside of the unit, so someone that doesn't have a ton of belongings is ideal since you'll be limited to the space in your room. (There is a den in the unit, but I use that room in its entirety and it is not available for your use. This is reflected in the price).

- No pets please


The neighbours on the street are close-knit, friendly, and family oriented. It's a warm, safe community.


The neighbours in our building are pleasant 20-30 somethings. I've been in this unit for 6 years and I've been very happy here.


ABOUT ME:


I'm a 30 year old woman who works from home most days as I run my own successful business of over 10 years. If you’re wondering what a roommate who works from home would be like, in my case I just work quietly between my desk in my room, and on my laptop in the living room (can’t sit in the same place all day haha).


I’m tidy, friendly, responsible, respectful, financially secure. I'm happy to keep to myself but also down to hang out a bit and watch some TV together if we click. I don't party or have people over very often (almost never now with COVID). I’ve had a few roommates over the years and they would all describe me as being very easy to live with. I can provide references if you like :)


LOOKING FOR:


Looking for a roommate who is: a professional female ideally in the same age range (late 20's early 30's) who is responsible, friendly, quiet, respectful, and a non-smoker.


Looking for someone who has all of the attributes one would want in a roommate: clean and tidy, cleans up after themselves especially in the kitchen, doesn’t leave clutter around, that kind of thing. I’d like someone who is quiet and doesn't play music or TV too loudly, especially with the other neighbours in the building in mind.


I like to keep the apartment pretty quiet and peaceful, I wouldn’t want people coming in and out a lot generally, but especially right now with COVID.


I'm past the drinking/party phase of my life and looking for someone in the same boat.


Ideal roommate in a word? Chill. (Please, no drama or crazies, you know who you are haha).


You would pay me $960 on the 25th of each month and this covers all costs. Of course if the expenses change considerably, I would adjust this figure. However costs have stayed pretty consistent over the years so I don’t expect this to be an issue.


Being completely financially secure and able to pay on time every month is a must, which should go without saying. I don’t mess around with this, so if $960 sounds like it would be tight for you, this won’t be a good fit.


If you're interested, send me a message with some info about yourself! I will reply to those who seem like they could potentially be a good fit and we can go from there :)


Thanks all!

address: 322 Johnston Rd, Kemptville, ON K0G 1J0, Canada
description:
Update: Currently all viewing times are booked. If strongly interested please check the ad again on Sep 1. Thank you for your interest.


Newly renovated, peaceful home on a 2-acre lot. This home boasts a custom-built Laurysen Kitchen with all new appliances and energy-efficient triple-pane windows. Two-toned cabinetry designed with detailed finishing touches and large, beautiful quartz countertops. Open-concept main floor with living, dining room and kitchen. Raised-ranch style with 3 bedrooms above grade and 2 below grade. A large, private backyard with above-ground pool and hot tub! The property is pet-friendly and includes an in-ground, invisible dog fence. Basement is mostly finished with a cozy wood stove, washer & dryer, and plenty of storage space. Privacy & convenience; only a three minute drive to your nearest grocery & hardware store.

Reference and credit check will be performed.

address: 207 Bell Street North, Ottawa, ON, K1R 0B9
description:
The perfect home for you whether you are working from home and need a calm space or looking to stay in close proximity of your favourite stores and restaurants.

Brand new condo style apartments for rent with spacious, stainless steel kitchens and beautiful living areas, available in amenity-filled Centretown West building.

Please contact us for virtual tour options.

Spacious, stainless steel kitchens and beautiful living areas, available in amenity-filled Centretown West building. Enjoy popular and trendy restaurants, shops and more in Little Italy, The Glebe and Chinatown! Minutes away from the highway, The Ottawa Hospital, Carleton University, and downtown Ottawa.

Suite Features
These suites feature stainless steel kitchen appliances, a free-standing kitchen island, built-in USB chargers and a balcony or patio in most units.

Amenities & Services
The luxury and convenient property amenities includes the city's largest rooftop terrace with shared BBQs, salt water hottubs and firepits

Also Enjoy

  • 24 hour rooftop fitness and yoga studio,
  • Clubhouse lounge with pool and shuffle board
  • Business centre
  • Pet spa and dog run
  • Theatre room
  • On-site convenience store
  • On-site restaurant and bar serving breakfast, lunch, dinner

Services
LIV Apartnents also offers an array of services for your convenience including:

  • 24-hour concierge
  • Dog walking
  • Pet grooming and sitting
  • Parcel storage
  • Dry cleaning services
  • Housekeeping
  • Guest suite
  • Handyperson services
  • Valet services

Location
LIV is ideally located in the heart of Ottawa, just steps to so many vibrant Ottawa communities. Little Italy, Chinatown, Glebe, Lansdowne and Centertown are a few blocks away with restaurants, delis, bakeries, pubs and shops. Take in the nightlife in the ByWard Market and Elgin Street. Bike, run or walk along the paths by the Ottawa River and Rideau Canal.

Utilities
Rental price includes heat and water. Hydro and parking are extra.

Forest Ridge is a beautiful apartment and townhome community located in Ottawa's desirable Centrepointe neighbourhood, sitting on over 20 acres of beautiful parkland. Stunning amenities such as an indoor pool, basketball court, gym, outdoor pool and so much more are just a few perks of choosing Forest Ridge. When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

Our excellent Centrepointe neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Algonquin College, College Square, IKEA and popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

address: 589 Rideau St, Ottawa, ON K1N 6A1, Canada
description:
Welcome to Wallis House!

This historic building, originally built in 1873 and converted into condo lofts in 1996 offers the perfect blend of historic character and modern design.This 1 bdrm + den ( office) 1.5 baths is an open concept design with original hardwood floors and exposed brick throughout, soaring 14 ft high ceilings and several huge floor to ceiling windows that flood the unit with natural light! The first level offers a living room with cozy gas fpl open to kitchen/eating area s/s appliances, private office, 2pce powder room, in-unit laundry, ample storage and balcony off the living room. A great space for entertaining! The 2nd level features a mezzanine loft that overlooks the 1st floor living space. The 2nd level offers a large master bedroom, private ensuite and 3 large double closets. Unit includes 1 parking space # 30... The location of course is prime! Only steps to Parliament, Rideau River, Byward Market, Rideau Center, U of O , and the list goes on! Truly a unique living experience, adult oriented building! Unit must be seen to be appreciated.

Building amenities include a rooftop terrace with BBQ , bike storage .Some furnishings available are in unit if needed.

Available Sept 1st, 2020 Monthly Rent $2500/mo plus utilities. For more details or to book a viewing please call 613 266-7844. Offer to lease conditional upon a satisfactory credit check and rental application at the sole and absolute discretion of the landlord. Rental application, including authorization for credit report; proof of employment and income statements to accompany offer to lease. Tenant to acquire content insurance.

Covid-19 procedures are required for all showings. Please use hand sanitizer/gloves provided and wear a mask while inside the property. If you or your partner have experienced Covid-19 symptoms or have traveled outside of Canada in the past 14 days, please do not visit the property. Only myself and up to two adults at a time will view the property, no children please. Please note, property has been professionally cleaned., cupboards, doors, lighting, will be left open/on for viewings, please refrain from touching surfaces. Thank you.

address: Glendale, Ottawa K1S1W3 ON
description: Located in the glebe, this single family home has been fully renovated. The house has 3 bedrooms and a top floor den/4th bedroom, fully finished basement and features all new windows, new bathrooms, kitchen and new laundry room. The house also has central ac and a natural gas fireplace in the living room. Other features include a park at each end of the street as well as a tennis court. Centrally located, all the shops on bank street are a short walk as is TD place. For more information or to book a viewing please call 613 235 2082 (this is a landline) Monday-Saturday 8am-7pm or leave a message and ur call will be returned

address: 375 Lisgar St, Ottawa, ON K2P 0E3, Canada
description:
This luxurious 1226 square foot corner unit with 2 bedrooms and two full baths has hardwood flooring, large windows, a gas fireplace and a large balcony for summer enjoyment and the BBQ. North facing windows get plenty of natural light. Open concept main rooms and a private master suite with a walk through closet area and 3pc bathroom. The open concept kitchen has stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, tiled backsplash, lots of cupboard /counter space and a kitchen island with a cafe eating area. The main space is versatile and provides great enjoyment areas that have good natural light.

address: , K2K 0A6, Kanata, ON, Canada
description:
MUST-SEE FURNISHED 3-BEDROOM EXECUTIVE KANATA TOWNHOME


This bright and modern three storey, three bedroom 2.5 bathroom executive townhome is located just minutes from the 417 highway, parks, transCanada trail, grocery stores, LCBO, banks, coffee shops, restaurants, shopping centres and big box stores (Costco, Home Depot, Canadian Tire, Walmart, Tanger Outlet etc.), the Kanata hi tech park and the new Department of National Defence (DND) campus. The home is also conveniently located on a bus route seconds from your door, and a one-minute drive to the Kanata Park and Ride. If you want to be in the middle of it all while you enjoy the quiet, peaceful sanctuary of Old Kanata (Beaverbrook) you have found the ideal place.


The unit is situated among a private enclave of only 16 townhomes on a corner lot site, and organized around a landscaped and cobbled interior courtyard. Mature trees surround the development, with oversized windows to take advantage of the natural boundary. Floor plans are well organized, making these homes feel spacious and airy. The development has a dynamic urban feel but with effort and attention paid to the privacy and identity of each individual unit. Extensive landscaping develops a connection between the Court and its green surroundings.


The furnished townhome offers 2 parking spots (garage and driveway), as well as 4 guest parking spots on the grounds to be shared among all residents. A ceramic-tiled entrance-way on the first floor leads to a half bathroom and home office (Bedroom 3) with Berber carpet. The home office features oversized windows that let in plenty of light anytime during the day, and a garden door giving access to an outdoor space bordered by cedar hedges and mature pine trees.


From the first floor, a dark oak hardwood staircase leads to an all-hardwood second level featuring a main living/dining room area with forced gas fireplace and Juliet balcony. Through the bright eat-in kitchen area featuring fridge, stove and dishwasher you can make your way to the garden door leading to a cozy outdoor deck overlooking the cobbled courtyard, perfect for relaxing after a long day at work.


On the third level, each roomy bedroom enjoys its own en-suite bathroom. The master bathroom features double sinks, glass-enclosed shower stall and a soaker tub. The en-suite bathroom in Bedroom 2 features a combination shower/tub and its own window that overlooks the cobbled courtyard. This level conveniently features two separate linen closets and a laundry closet with a full-sized front-load washer and dryer (no stairs or coin-operated laundry!). To keep the unit in optimal condition, pets and smoking are not permitted.


The home is heated by natural gas forced air furnace and includes central air for those hot, muggy summer days, as well as a whole home humidifier to increase your personal comfort in the winter and minimize symptoms of dry skin and noses, asthma, allergies and static electricity. Unlimited internet service and four-season grounds maintenance (e.g. grass cutting in the summer, snow removal in the winter) are provided. An unfinished basement provides some storage options. The cost for this is included in the rent.


We’ve taken care to provide quality housing to the region’s most exclusive clientele. We offer a safe, quiet and comfortable environment so that you feel right at home and can sleep in peace at night.


All this for $2700 per month plus utilities. Available October 1.


***** Viewings available on Sunday August 29 from 1PM to 5PM. ******


I bet you are tired of landlords who don’t care. So are we. We are looking for the right tenants who will treasure and enjoy this property.


Call today, this must-see unit will not last long!


KANATA, ON

Forest Ridge has everything you could desire in an apartment rental community!

description:
Live in a beautiful family oriented Riverside South. This modern Urbandale executive townhome features a bright tile foyer, hardwood floor throughout the living and dining room. Upper level features hardwood throughout and offers 3 generous size bedrooms and two full bathrooms, each with tile flooring and quartz counters. address: 445 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1R 5C1, Canada
description:
Available on September 1st, professionally painted and furnished Penthouse condo for rent in modern downtown condo building in the heart of Ottawa. It includes a heated underground parking spot, central air conditioning/heating with smart thermostat, in-unit laundry, dishwasher, and a convenient storage unit. Utilities (hydro, heating, A/C and water) included.


Unpack your suitcases and enjoy the privacy of an executive condo in Ottawa's business/political district, across the street from a pharmacy, a supermarket, a dry-cleaner and a gym/salt-water pool.


Luxurious corner unit with floor-to-ceiling windows, which provide 270-degree views over Ottawa's Southeast, South and Southwest; over 30-kilometre vistas, including the Ottawa River. Sunrises in the morning, and sunsets at dusk. Only five neighbours per floor, in a quiet and well-managed building. High-speed elevator with short waiting times. Unique and inspired living for teleworking arrangements.


Ideal for professionals seeking the convenience of being close to all services, while avoiding a rental apartment building. Walking distance to Parliament, several Ministries, Bank of Canada, embassies, and consulates.


Large open space with separate bedroom (king-sized bed), and a new premium mattress. Custom privacy/blackout window screen in bedroom and custom privacy blinds in the living and dining spaces. Designated computer desk in the den. Ample dressing area with additional closet space. German leather sofa in the living space. High-end mid-century designer furniture. Sunny penthouse balcony open to the sky. Premium hardwood floors throughout, ideal for individuals with allergies.


Granite countertops and backsplash, quiet appliances (including Fisher-Paykel refrigerator from New Zealand), in-unit washer and dryer (including brand new Samsung steam washer), and Nespresso coffee machine.


Also included, a heated, convenient and spacious parking spot on the first underground floor (with remote door opener), and a storage unite conveniently located next to the parking spot.


Proof of indeterminate employment and references required.


Sorry, pets and smoking not allowed.


Perfect condo for professionals seeking to be close to all that Ottawa has to offer.

The bathroom has been tiled and renovated, with quartz countertops and extra vanity for storage and make-up/morning prep. There are laundry facilities in the apartment with a new front-loading washer/dryer.


There is an additional 5 x 13 foot room that could be used as an office, baby's room or storage. There are many cupboards throughout.


Approximate measurements in feet: Living room: 17.6 x 13 Dining room: 9.6 x 8 .6 Kitchen: 8.6 x 10.6 Master bedroom: 15.3 x 12 Second bedroom: 15.3 x 9.6 Office/Storage: 13 x 5 Bathroom: 10.6 x 9 Storage under stairs: 8.6 x 3.6 Balconies x 2: 7 x 11.4


The building has additional amenities. There is a secure buzzer entry into the building, an indoor parking space with outdoor visitor parking, outdoor swimming pool, exercise/sauna room, hobby room, games and party room and bicycle storage room.

The galley style kitchen is equipped with five appliances, easy to maintain hardwood flooring and new style backsplash. The kitchen access the east facing breakfast area over looking the balcony that offers a panoramic view of parks from the 23 floor. The Master Bedroom is equipped with double closet mirrored doors, accordion pleated blinds and ensuite full bath room with marble flooring. A spacious second bedroom with mirrored closet doors and blinds. The second bathroom has a large walk-in shower stall, white ceramic tile flooring and trim with wall to wall mirrored wall. The flooring of the condo is hardwood and marble with warm wall to wall carpets only in the bedrooms.

The site has indoor and outdoor pools, hot tubs, four tennis courts, ping pong, gym, racquet, badminton courts, billiard room, library, family, games/cards rooms, library and golf training indoor facility.

The rent includes one indoor parking, TV cable and water, Maintenance and condo administrators on site. The apartment has additional large storage room in basement, generous visitor parking, car wash, air pump and bikes room. . There is an air-conditioning in the unit and is provided with efficient electric heating.


The condo living includes accessibility to party and game rooms, up-scaled recreation and fitness facilities , sauna, aqua classes, group fitness training, yoga, Jacuzzi, racquet and tennis courts, swimming pools surrounded by luxury gardens and outdoor fully equipped with barbecue facilities.


The Riviera is a pet and smoking free complex. Excellent location very close to General Hospital, Children’s Hospital, University of Ottawa, Carleton University, Lycée Claudel school, Transit way, LRT and Queensway, minutes from downtown and parliament.

address: Terravita Private, K1V 2S1, Ottawa, ON
description:
Welcome to 707 Terravita Private. A bright and airy, modern townhome built at the end of 2019. This three-story space is made for those who want to come home to a chic and simple house. Everything about this place is new and untouched. Large windows, pair with light coloured wood and eggshell walls to optimizes natural light.

The Tour

Upon entering, we step up from the tile onto the engineered hardwood after jackets go into the spacious closet. From here, we can reach the basement, as well as the garage, which can be manually operated or controlled through an app.
There is a powder room and a sliding door that leads to the backyard.

Up the stairs, and you’ll meet the wide open living room and kitchen. With near floor to ceiling windows, this is the highlight. The kitchen is made with black granite, and brand new GE appliances. The balcony sits just outside the kitchen. What will you do with it? Maybe yoga, gardening, barbecues? (We’re thinking little movie nights with string lights.)

Finally, the top floor has 3 bedrooms and 2 full washrooms. The master bedroom with a full washroom and walk-in closet attached, and you can find the other washroom with a large mirror further down the hall. Extra storage is in a sliding closet, and a slimmer door reveals a stacked washer and dryer.

Location

Terravita Private is a 3 minute drive from South Keys, or Greenboro (main bus and train stations to get into the city from this end). South Keys is a strip mall with a Walmart, Loblaws, Marshalls, and restaurants, all the way to the Greenboro station. There is a bus stop across the street from the townhome to get you there in 5 minutes. Our space is also situated across the street from a quaint shopping plaza, which has a Lonestar, A&W, Petro Canada, or Starbucks for a quick bite.

We’re so excited for you to see it. Send us a message here, or email me at elainesitu@rogers.com to arrange a private viewing. It is available at the beginning of November.

You can find more pictures at: https://rentals.ca/ottawa/707-terravita-private

Situated in the central west end of Ottawa and in walking distance to the beach, Britannia Parkside offers everything you desire. From updated kitchens and bathrooms, refinished hardwood floors, upgraded common areas and a fresh exterior to the convenience of nearby amenities, you will be proud to call Britannia Parkside your new home!

OTTAWA WEST APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Britannia Beach neighbourhood, Britannia Parkside offers newly updated bachelor apartments, one bedroom apartments, two bedroom apartments and three bedroom apartments. Our residents can enjoy scenic views of the Ottawa River and Gatineau Hills from their doorsteps, walk over to Britannia Beach for a relaxing day under the sun, or take a stroll on the extensive biking and hiking trails just steps away.

Our excellent Britannia Beach neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Bayshore Shopping Centre, Coliseum Movie Theatre, Farm Boy and more popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Whatever your desire is, Britannia Parkside is the perfect place to call home!

Superb location adjacent to the Hurdman Light Rail Train Station and bus terminal as well as the 417 hwy - makes for an easy commute to Downtown, UofO and the Ottawa General Hospital.

Please note this is a pet and smoke free building.


Les jardins bien entretenus, les équipements de style complexe et le hall d'entrée haut de gamme, la Riviera II impressionnera!

Grande cuisine et salle à manger.

Salon lumineux avec un mur de fenêtres donnant sur les toits du centre-ville et les collines de la Gatineau.

Buanderie et rangement en suite.

Le complexe Riviera promeut une vie saine avec un centre de remise en forme, des cours gratuits de yoga / fitness, des piscines intérieure et extérieure, des courts de tennis et de squash, un bain à remous, un sauna et un BBQ PIT.

Un espace de stationnement est inclus dans le garage souterrain sécurisé qui offre également une baie de lavage de voiture.

Superbe emplacement adjacent à la gare de train léger sur rail Hurdman et à la gare routière ainsi qu'à l'autoroute 417 - permet de se rendre facilement au centre-ville, à l'UdeO et à l'Hôpital général d'Ottawa.

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

At 475 & 485 King Edward you can not only manage your life in upscale heritage style, but you are also right around the corner from the most dynamic section of downtown and the University of Ottawa. At 475 & 485 King Edward we offer heritage style 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom apartments. The convenience of our downtown location makes 475 & 485 King Edward an address that you will love calling home.

Located in Sandy Hill of downtown Ottawa, just a few blocks from the Rideau Canal, young professionals and adults are drawn to the area because of its easy access to the most exciting attractions in town. Come visit us at 475 & 485 King Edward and see how exciting downtown life can be!

At 475 & 485 King Edward you can not only manage your life in upscale heritage style, but you are also right around the corner from the most dynamic section of downtown and the University of Ottawa. At 475 & 485 King Edward we offer heritage style 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom apartments. The convenience of our downtown location makes 475 & 485 King Edward an address that you will love calling home.

Located in Sandy Hill of downtown Ottawa, just a few blocks from the Rideau Canal, young professionals and adults are drawn to the area because of its easy access to the most exciting attractions in town. Students love the building because of its location just down the street from the University of Ottawa and minutes from the ByWard Market, home to a variety of restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and pubs.

Come visit us at 475 & 485 King Edward and see how exciting downtown life can be!

description:
Open House Hours:

Open house hours currently suspended, please contact us for virtual and recorded tour options.  

Offering completely contactless rentals! Search, rent and move in without having to meet us in person.

Situated in the central west end of Ottawa and in walking distance to the beach, Britannia Parkside offers everything you desire. From updated kitchens and bathrooms, refinished hardwood floors, upgraded common areas and a fresh exterior to the convenience of nearby amenities, you will be proud to call Britannia Parkside your new home!

OTTAWA WEST APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Britannia Beach neighbourhood, Britannia Parkside offers newly updated bachelor apartments, one bedroom apartments, two bedroom apartments and three bedroom apartments. Our residents can enjoy scenic views of the Ottawa River and Gatineau Hills from their doorsteps, walk over to Britannia Beach for a relaxing day under the sun, or take a stroll on the extensive biking and hiking trails just steps away.

Our excellent Britannia Beach neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Bayshore Shopping Centre, Coliseum Movie Theatre, Farm Boy and more popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Whatever your desire is, Britannia Parkside is the perfect place to call home!

Welcome to 1030-1040 Hollington, offering modern home comforts in a ideal Ottawa West neighbourhood. This building offers spacious bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments, which include hardwood and ceramic flooring, along with new vanities and fixtures. These suites have been sought after by young professionals, couples, small families, students and retirees who are all looking for the convenience of city life with the comforts of home.

Arbor Village is located along the edges of Ottawa's scenic Experimental Farm. Residents at Hollington can enjoy the farm's exceptional gardens, as well as the walking and biking trails. It's convenient location to Ottawa's popular Carling Ave and Merivale Rd is ideal due to the numerous public parks, shopping options, restaurants, grocery stores, medical facilities and schools. Nearby public transportation and Highway 417 make commuting to work or school easy.

A beautiful walk or short drive can take you to the Rideau Canal, where you will find scenic views and trails, as well as a selection of restaurants. Students are attracted to the village's close proximity to the acclaimed Carleton University and Algonquin College.

Byron offers on-site laundry facilities, secure entranceways and 24-hour emergency service for residents.

Westboro Village boasts some of the trendiest boutiques and is home to chic, award winning restaurants and lounges that rival some of the best in the country. Enjoy all the amenities, services, and unique festivals the neighbourhood has to offer, like Westfest, Parkdale Farmer's Market, Baker Street Cafe, Starbucks, and more.

Take a break from bustling Westboro Village by heading over to Westboro Beach to enjoy some sun, or go for a stroll, run or bike along the Sir John A. Macdonald Parkway. Commutes to work or school are made easy with Byron's close proximity to public transportation and Highway 417.

Welcome to 57 Bayswater in Hintonburg, Ottawa! Nestled in the centre of Hintonburg, our trendy and creative community is home to students, professionals and families who enjoy being close to all the opportunities Hintonburg has to offer!

HINTONBURG OTTAWA APARTMENTS

In addition to a great neighbourhood, we offer:

Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and two bedroom apartments, gorgeous views from private balconies, laminate and ceramic flooring throughout, on-site laundry and fitness facility and easy access to public transportation and biking trails. All of these features and a winning location in the middle of vibrant neighbourhood make 57 Bayswater the perfect place to live.

Our spacious apartments offer the right fit for any lifestyle, whether you're a college student attending Algonquin College, a professional who works in the downtown core, or a family that enjoys living in a dynamic neighbourhood close to numerous parks and cultural outlets.

Every one of our apartments holds the high-end amenities you've come to expect from city living. Our apartments are outfitted with hardwood, laminate and ceramic tile throughout, giving each layout a modern feel. The views from each unit's private balcony are breathtaking.

Call 57 Bayswater at 613-518-1308 today and set up a tour!

address: 1401 Prince of Wales Drive, Ottawa, ON, K2C 3J8
description:
We are looking for an energetic, self motivated, handy, serivce oriented person to join our Paramount Property Team as a live in superintendent.

Paramount Property is a family run business celebrating 30 years of service this year and we are looking for a new member to join!!

POSITION:
Live-In Building Superintendent
Full-time position commencing as soon as possible
Rate of Pay $26,000.00 - $30,000/ year, apartment provided and utilities covered, basic cable and parking also included.
Health benefits after 3 months.
40 Hours per week

Job Description

To perform all Superintendent duties for high-rise apartment building. The position is responsible for all repairs assigned by the Property Manager.

These tasks include:
Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on heating, cooling and ventilation systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on plumbing systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on electrical systems, Troubleshoot and perform minor repairs on appliances, Paint, Repair drywall, Perform routine maintenance jobs and repairs, Work with minimal supervision

Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time Days, Rotating On Call/ Weekend schedules- All work on the 1st of the month!

Work Conditions and Physical Capabilities: Work under pressure, Physically demanding, Bending, crouching, kneeling
MUST HAVE OWN SET OF TOOLS & Safety footwear. Uniforms & coats provided

If you feel that this is a position for you we would love to meet with you.
Contact us via kijiji or email your resume directly to us at pow3@paramountapts.com
Criminal Background check will be conducted.

- Backs onto a green area, no rear neighbors, with walkout finished basement.

- First floor is open concept with a good size kitchen/eating area, powder room, dining room and living room and balcony facing the green area.

-Three bedrooms on the second level. A master bedroom with ensuite bath, a walk-in closet and two additional bedrooms with walk-in-closet and a full bath.

address: Tribeca Private, Ottawa, ON K2J 4G3, Canada
description:
Rent is $ 2100.00 plus utilities. This is really wonderful and convenient for the a Muslim person or family. Just right beside the SNMC Mosque in Barrhaven, 3 minutes walking distance. Bright, Spacious & Pristine is this 2 Bed 2 Bath apartment style living w/ many updates. This home will not disappoint. Nothing to do but unpack and

enjoy. Beautiful upgraded porcelain floors greet you as you enter and flow in to the kitchen & dining area. Open concept living w/ beautiful hardwood

flooring which continue down the hallway & into the bedrooms. The kitchen w/ upgraded cabinetry to ceiling height, quartz counter top, ice glass tile

back splash, undermount sink, faucet & stainless steel appliances. Both baths have upgraded cabinets & quartz counter tops & undermount sinks.

The Master Bedroom has a walk-in closet plus a large double door closet - lots of storage. And the master ensuite shower is an upgrade. Also to note

is the upgraded baseboards and casing throughout and no "pop corn ceilings", upgraded to flat ceiling throughout. So, there you have it! A beautiful

home! Come and enjoy.

address: 2625 Regina St, Ottawa, ON K2B, Canada
description:
A well maintained building with elegant lobby. Move in ready! Light hardwood throughout. Newer windows. Living room and bedroom have walls of closets. This main level unit is located at the back of the building. It has a view over a terrace deck. There is a door directly from the unit to a lovely patio with direct access to a landscaped area. The building is located in a park-like setting and has quick access to shopping and transportation. Walk to Britannia Conservation Area (Mud Lake), Britannia Park and Beach, cycle along the Ottawa River pathway, etc. Steps to shopping and transit. Amenities include indoor salt water pool, sauna, fitness centre, library, billiards room, workshop, party room, guest suites, outdoor tennis courts, walking path and BBQ area. Heated underground parking included, as well as car wash bays and indoor bicycle storage.

Fully renovated condo offers a kitchen featuring modern features and finishes. Energy efficient appliances like Stove and Fridge are included in the Kitchen. New bathroom includes upgraded fixtures and new mirror. Throughout the unit you will find newly finished flooring, new tiles in the kitchen and bathrooms. Interior walls and doors have been upgraded with fresh paint to complete the look and feel of your bright and modern space.

Situated in a charming neighborhood with beautifully landscaped grounds, the Regina building is a place you’ll want to call home. The condo is beautiful and recently renovated and has a patio. This safe, secure, building has controlled access system with resident calling system. The building is 10 minutes walk from Britannia Beach and close to various shopping and grocery stores.

address: 324 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1P 0A4, Canada
description:
Beautiful 1 bedroom PLUS large den in one of Ottawa's most sought after condominiums, The Mondrian. This high-ceiling, sun-filled, fully furnished unit with floor to ceiling windows includes everything you could imagine, from stylish furniture right down to the hangers. Every detail has been thought of so you can move right in & enjoy all that is within walking distance: shopping, Parliament Hill, groceries, restaurants, government buildings, University of Ottawa & transit. Enjoy the views from your large 16th floor balcony or while bbq-ing on the terrace enjoying the luxurious pool & private cabanas. Host your gatherings in style in the large party room with kitchenette, TV & pool table. No need for expensive gym memberships when you have your own gym on site. Condo includes security & concierge service. It is rare to find a sophisticated, modern, fully furnished rental that INCLUDES high-speed Fibre Stream internet, 1 underground parking space & in-suite laundry for only $2100/mnth. Available immediately.

Please note: Applicant must provide recent credit report, Government issued ID, and proof of employment . No pets, No smoking.

Contact Deanna Renzi at Sutton Group Ottawa Realty today for your showing: drenzi@sutton.com

description:
*CREDIT CHECK REQUIRED*

September 1st 2020 - August 1st 2021.


Excuse the mess! I just moved into this apartment but would like to move out for personal reasons, nothing to do with the unit, the apartment is beautiful and cozy with a balcony that overlooks the trees in the backyard and a washer and dryer in the kitchen!


It is a 3 bedroom apartment in a 3 story house. You will be living with 1 other roomate and have a spare room to do with what the two of you decide, either an office or rent out the space, etc.


The current roomate lives on the 3rd level in a loft which is seperated by a door so you will have the main floor (second floor) mostly to yourself. The 1st floor is a seperate unit. Your roommate is a 27 year old english major student, male, gamer, private, minds his business but has good social skills.


Your rent is $537.50 plus $30 internet and half of hydro (very cheap in quebec!) First and last month is required: a total of $1075 upfront.


This location is very close to downtown ottawa with super cheap living. Steps to convenience stores, mcdonalds, thrift shops, restaurants, etc.


Small pets allowed. Move in date is September 1st but can be earlier if needed. Storage shed in the backyard for bikes!

These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. description:
Please contact us for virtual or guided tour options.

Working from home and looking for a comfortable space or looking to stay connected in Downtown Ottawa? Riviera Apartments does it both!

These spacious suites are newly renovated featuring ceramic and hardwood flooring, new lighting, designer two tone paint and much more.

Riviera Apartments is located just a short distance from Downtown Ottawa, Place du Portage and Global Affairs Canada- ideal for any government workers who are looking for a short commute. Conveniently located in the heart of Aylmer, Riviera Apartments is near the bustling Aylmer Marina and all the shopping and dining options along Rue Principale (Main Street).

Many sought-after amenities and features include:

  • Appliances included
  • Elevators at all buildings
  • Utilities included
  • On-site laundry facilities
  • Indoor and outdoor parking
  • Tennis and basketball courts
  • 2 outdoor swimming pools
  • Residents lounge
  • Secure entrances
  • On-site staff and 24 hour emergency service
  • 2 media rooms
  • 2 fitness rooms
  • Upgrades do not apply to all units

Riviera Apartmentsis conveniently surrounded by amenities such schools, parks, medical facilities, restaurants, and shopping. Riviera makes for an ideal place to live with close proximity to Highway 14, allowing for an easy commute to Gatineau - Hull and Ottawa. The Rideau Centre is a quick and easy bus ride away on STO #1. Now Youre Home.

For more information, or to book a viewing please call or email!

Les Appartements Rivieras sont situés à une courte distance du centre-ville d'Ottawa et du complexe Place du Portage - idéale pour les professionnels qui veulent un court trajet au travail. Grâce à leur emplacement pratique en plein coeur d'Aylmer, les Appartements Riviera sont procheà la Marina d'Aylmer et lesboutiques et restaurants tout le long de la rue Principale.

Ces suites spacieuses nouvellement rénovés présentent des planchers de céramique et de bois franc, de nouveaux luminaires, une peinture de conception deux tons et bien plus encore.

Parmi les nombreuses commodités et caractéristiques recherchés, mentionnons:

  • Appareils électroménagers compris

  • Entrées sécurisées
  • Personnel sur place et service d'urgence 24 heures sur 24

Les Appartements Riviera sont situés à proximité des services sociaux, comme des écoles, des parcs, des centres médicaux, des restaurants et des centres dachat. Riviera représente un milieu de vie idéal, puis qu'il est situé à proximité de l'autoroute 148 et des voies de transport publiques, ce qui permet de se déplacer facilement entre Gatineau-Hull et Ottawa. Quelques minutes du centre Rideau en autobus STO#1.

address: , VIEUX MONTREAL  H2Y1W3 QC, Canada
description:
DISPONIBLE MAINTENANT


Ce loft rassemble le charme du Vieux-Montréal et les nécessités d'aujourd'hui. Situé dans un immeuble historique et dans un cadre urbain idéal, il offre un espace semi-décloisonné à briques exposées avec des Belles Fenêtre Look "Romeo et Juliette".

Cette propriété intime et unique a des charmants détails architecturaux, de grandes belles fenêtres, des poutres et colonnes originales en bois et des planchers et plafonds en bois franc. Une salle de bain complète avec une douche et une autre salle d’eau.

Entièrement rénové et avec 636 pied carre ce loft est localisé au 5 IIème étage du magnifique immeuble converti en 2008. Il se trouve au cœur battant de Vieux Montréal. Avec un concept de style ouvert, il offre beaucoup de volume, des tonnes de lumière et une disposition très spacieuse.

BEL EMPLACEMENT! Au Vieux Montréal, le tout est accessible à pied : restaurants, festivités, boutiques, centre-ville, vieux port.

A Proximité du centre-ville; 5 minutes à pieds du Métro Square Victoria; 8 minutes de marche de la Gare centrale; à quelques pas des arrêts d’autobus et transport public; marche à pied et cyclisme à côté de Canal Lachine; à proximité du CHUM, de l'UQAM, autoroutes, épicerie Métro avec stationnement intérieur gratuit, de la Tour de la Bourse, des attraits du Vieux Montréal tels que le Centre des sciences de Montréal et la plage de l'horloge, d'une piste cyclable menant jusqu'au marché Atwater, du Centre de commerce mondial, etc.

UN CHARME PARTICULIER À NE PAS MANQUER! Building Overview

Welcome to the Sadler's Court Apartments! 67 Cartier is ideally located in Ottawa's Golden Triangle, where you'll find yourself nestled in a quiet, residential neighbourhood, yet just steps from the lively Elgin Street. 67 Cartier Street is a mid-ride 10-storey apartment building offering large and spacious bachelors, one and two bedroom apartments.

description: BRAND NEW, WATERFALL-FACING CONDO IN DOWNTOWN OTTAWA. Inspired by the traditional Dutch canal homes of Amsterdam, “Kanaal” is another architectural masterpiece from Barry Hobin and Associates. The “Shore” model is a thoughtfully laid out plan, which boasts beautiful finishes inspired by the history and natural surroundings of the site. The apartment is located on the edge of a planned auropean town square with parks, hundreds of kilometres of bike paths and the magnificent Chaudière Falls steps from the lobby. The new LRT, Place du Portage and Terraces de la Chaudiere are also all within a 5-10 minute walk. Views from the balcony include a view of the Falls, Ottawa River and the Gatineau Hills. As a bonus, you can sleep easy knowing that you are mitigating your carbon footprint thanks to the building's LEED Platinum designation and revolutionary district thermal heating and cooling system. This renovated, clean, bright & spacious 8th floor, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment is centrally located at 20 Chesterton Drive (off of Meadowlands) and is perfect for working professionals, students, or anyone looking to downsize.

The spacious master and second bedrooms as well as the bathroom boast large closets for plenty of in-unit storage. The bathroom is updated with a new countertop. The private balcony has views of the outdoor pool, the city and the Gatineau Hills.


Heat, hydro, water, insurance, storage unit and a designated underground, heated parking spot are included in the rent.

The location is within walking distance to multiple strip malls (shopping, restaurants and entertainment), groceries, popular fitness facility and is in close proximity to parks, paths, Algonquin College, Carleton University and all amenities. Just a short commute to the Ottawa International Airport, the Civic and Riverside Hospitals, Tunney’s Pasture etc.


The area is well serviced by both express and regular public transit (OC Transpo).


Commuters will appreciate the quick and easy access to Merivale Road, Meadowlands Drive, Hunt Club Road and Woodroffe Avenue.


Non-smoking tenants only as the condominium corporation enforces a strict smoke-free building and property. Apartment is pet-friendly.

description:
Welcome to Kanaal - Sustainable and Downtown Ottawa living at its best ! Inspired by the Dutch architecture of canal homes in Amsterdam, Kanaal condos combine European style with modern, urban finishes. Kanaal's location is unparalleled - surrounded by an extensive bike network and walking paths, it is minutes away from downtown Hull, downtown Ottawa, Lebreton flats, Ottawa’s LRT Pimisi Station, and is a stone’s throw away from Chaudiere Falls ! As a Kanaal resident, you will be part of a transformative project and Canada’s largest and most sustainable waterfront city. Kanaal has a LEED Platinum Designation, and a revolutionary district thermal heating and cooling system.


Features:


This elegantly furnished unit (686 sf + balcony) is located on the fourth floor facing the north side, looking onto Head Street Square, a vibrant public courtyard (under construction).


The unit offers:


stainless steel, eco-friendly, sustainable finishes and appliances (washer, dryer, microwave, kitchen stove and an upgraded 30’ fridge)

Open-space kitchen with lots of space and counter-space

Engineered hardwood floors and granite countertops;

Personal locker

Bike storage

Balcony

Access to Gym


Unit is available as of September 1st. Minimum one year rent. RENT includes water, furniture, personal locker and bike storage. Tenant pays hydro (likely to be lower than average due to LEED designation//revolutionary district thermal heating and cooling system//) + internet (hardware is already set up).


If you are interested in living in this one of a kind sustainable community, please fill out the application form (http://www.freeottawainfo.com/RentApp.pdf). Tenant background check (s) required.

address: 118 Charlotte Street, Ottawa, ON, K1N 8K3
description:
Enjoy living in this modern 2 bdr, 2 bath apartment off of Rideau and Cobourgh Street. The home is adjacent to McDonald Gardens Park and steps away from the Rideau River, offering picturesque views in walking distance to all!

The stunning interior features upgrades throughout with pot lights in every room, gleaming hardwood floors, an electric fireplace, high end furnishings, central air, in-floor heating, an open concept layout.

The dream kitchen includes a custom backsplash, a large center island, granite countertops and three stainless steel appliances (fridge, stove and dishwasher).

The state of the art bathroom boasts double sinks with custom finishes that extend to the ensuite bath that features a glass spa shower.

The bedrooms include one queen and one king bed with large windows, plenty of closet space and hardwood floors.

The exterior is an excellent area for entertaining with a private deck to enjoying those warm summer days in this sought after location.

The home is minutes away from the Byward Market, The New Edinburgh amenities, Rideau Centre and The University of Ottawa. The area also provides quick access to grocery stores, restaurants, banks, shopping and entertainment.

Rent - $2,699/month All Included (Wifi included)

Now Available - Showing upon request

Welcome to 197 Cumberland, where not only can you relax in affordable style, but you are a short walk away from the most dynamic section of downtown Ottawa, the ByWard Market. Ideal for university students and young professionals, at the pet friendly 197 Cumberland we offer clean and upscale bachelor apartments and 1 bedroom apartments.

197 Cumberland is located in the bustling ByWard Market/Lowertown neighbourhood of downtown Ottawa. Tucked away in a secluded and quiet neighborhood just a few blocks from the heart of the ByWard Market, residents can enjoy the nearby Ottawa River, University of Ottawa, Rideau Centre and a variety of shops, restaurants and entertainment.

Come visit us at 197 Cumberland and you'll discover how enticing downtown life can be.

address: Barrhaven, Ottawa, ON K2J, Canada
description:
The unit is a 3 bedroom and 1.5 bathroom town home. Hardwood on the ground floor. Carpet on the second floor. Master bedroom with walk-in closet. Basement laundry. All included brand new stainless steel appliances, including Stove, Fridge, dishwasher, washer and dryer.

The house will be ready for occupancy on september 20th or October 1st, 2020.

We are asking $1950 per month, and tenant will be responsible for Utilities Extra (hydro, gas and water) + Hot Water Tank Rental.
--------------------
Location:
*It is close to Michaelle Jean Public School, Mother Teresa High School and Berrigan Elementary School.
*Close to public transportation (277 and 74)
*5 minute’s walk to Farmboy and Scotiabank, 3 minutes walk to watershield Park.
*3 minutes drive to most of stores (Costco, Walmart, Loblaws, Canadian Tire, Home Depot, Best Buy, Staples, Indigo and etc,)
--------------------
*No Pets
*No Smoking Cigarettes and no weed.
* Rental Application, Employment Letter, Credit Check, Rental History and References Check.
*No subletting allowed.
* A full Ontario Lease Agreement for minimum 12 months will be required along with 1st month’s payment and a security deposit of 1 month’s payment at time of signing.

address: Cumberland St, Ottawa, ON K1N, Canada
1380 Prince of Wales Dr, Ottawa, ON K2C 3N6, Canada
description:
Superb bright, clean and spacious 3 bedroom high-rise Condo with a HUGE balcony. Great location, just minutes walk from Carleton University, grocery stores, restaurants, Mooney’s Bay, Hog's Back Falls, Rideau Canal and River.


Ceramic tiles in kitchen and bathrooms. Beautiful laminate floors in all bedrooms, living room, dining room, and hallway. Large storage room in the unit. Complex has bike storage, heated indoor pool, sauna, and laundry room in the building.


Looking for full year lease. References required. Email for more details and booking a viewing.

address: 2-1357 Kingston Avenue, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 8L1
description:
Due to the on-going pandemic any viewings will be limited to pre-approved applicants. You must apply and be approved prior to viewing the unit.

There is no cost to apply and this pre-approval does not commit you to renting the property, since you will have the right to accept or refuse after viewing.

If you are interested in viewing or applying, please either contact our office by email at rentals@pmamanagement.com or download a rental application from our website at http://www.pmamanagement.com/rentals/index.php

3 Bedroom Top Floor Apartment in great a location near the Experimental Farm. Great community with lots of great hiking, biking and walking trails. Close to shopping, schools and restaurants. Bus stop is only a minute walk away. Civic Hospital is nearby.

Features open concept with lots of natural light, kitchen with fridge & stove, 1 bath, beautiful large window in the living room and a back balcony with room for a table and chairs, combination of hardwood & tile. Coin operated washer & dryer in basement for all tenants use. 1 outside parking is included in the rent.

Tenant is responsible for hydro, gas heat and water are included. This is a quiet non-smoking building and prefer no pets please.

To arrange a viewing appointment , please call PMA at 613-742-5778 and press "1" for rentals, any weekday between 8:30 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. (4:00 p.m. on Fridays). Appointments may take place during the daytime, early evening or on Saturdays, but all must be booked during office our hours.

Directions: Off Merivale Road. Coming from the west end take 417 to Kirkwood. Turn right on Kirkwood. Turn right on Merivale Road. Turn left on Trenton Avenue. Turn right on Prince Street, then another right on Kingston Avenue.

address: Helmsdale Dr, Kanata, ON K2K 2S2, Canada
description: This spacious 3 bed room, 3 bath town-home is ideally located within a short walking distance to the high-tech area, shopping, parks, schools and recreation facilities that Kanata offers. The main level boasts hardwood floors with separate dining and living areas. A wonderful and spacious galley kitchen provides a large eat-in area with patio doors leading to the fully fenced back yard for children and pets to play. The oversized master bedroom features a large walk-in closet with access to the luxury bath w/separate shower and Roman tub. Two additional bedrooms boast large windows for lots of light to enter. The lower level offers a great spacious rec-room with easy maintenance laminate floors making it a wonderful family entertainment space. A convenient 3 piece bathroom completes this area with lots of storage space. Driveway can accommodate 3 vehicles.

Welcome to Westboro one of Ottawa's most prestigious areas, where stunning modern touches blend seamlessly in a beautiful historic neighbourhood. At WEST236 residents will find striking views of the Ottawa River from private balconies, as well as premium finishes throughout every element of their new home.

LUXURY WESTBORO APARTMENTS

Located in one of the most sought-after neighbourhoods in Ottawa, WEST236 is the perfect combination of space, luxury and convenience. These newly built apartments have been designed to meet the needs of every lifestyle. Whether you're looking for a bachelor apartment or a two bedroom plus den, there are a variety of layouts for you to choose from. Settle into your new home in this stunning Westboro location.

Westboro Village offers some of the best shopping, dining and neighbourhood amenities that can be found in the Capital region. Steps from this new building are conveniences such as the Real Canadian Superstore, Farm Boy and the LCBO. Take a stroll down vibrant Richmond Road and discover delicious food options, unique boutique shopping and so much more. This unmatched location means you are minutes from the scenic Ottawa River, with kilometers of biking or walking trails to explore or walk your furry friend. Enjoy the summer sunshine at any number of patios within walking distance, or venture to popular Westboro Beach. Whatever lifestyle you enjoy, at WEST236 there is a suite for every need.

Situated in the central west end of Ottawa and in walking distance to the beach, Britannia Parkside offers everything you desire. From updated kitchens and bathrooms, refinished hardwood floors, upgraded common areas and a fresh exterior to the convenience of nearby amenities, you will be proud to call Britannia Parkside your new home!

OTTAWA WEST APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Britannia Beach neighbourhood, Britannia Parkside offers newly updated bachelor apartments, one bedroom apartments, two bedroom apartments and three bedroom apartments. Our residents can enjoy scenic views of the Ottawa River and Gatineau Hills from their doorsteps, walk over to Britannia Beach for a relaxing day under the sun, or take a stroll on the extensive biking and hiking trails just steps away.

Our excellent Britannia Beach neighbourhood and easy access to main highways and bus stops gives residents the option to discover everything Ottawa has to offer. We are just minutes from Bayshore Shopping Centre, Coliseum Movie Theatre, Farm Boy and more popular entertainment, dining and shopping options.

Whatever your desire is, Britannia Parkside is the perfect place to call home!

When you choose Forest Ridge you're selecting more than just a home, it's a lifestyle.

CENTREPOINTE OTTAWA APARTMENTS

Conveniently located in Ottawa's Centrepointe neighbourhood, Forest Ridge Apartments offers newly updated bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and 2 bedroom apartments as well as stunning 2 bedroom townhomes and 3 bedroom townhomes. Our residents can enjoy pure relaxation at our indoor pool, and take in the sun by the shimmering outdoor pool, or if your looking to get active, stop by our resident gym.

At Crystal Beach Suites, a superb river side location meets a unique urban feel in one of the most desirable neighbourhoods in Ottawa, ON. Crystal Beach Suites has it all, spacious and beautiful townhomes and apartments, top-notch amenities and a peaceful setting with an easy drive to bustling Kanata. 

CRYSTAL BEACH OTTAWA APARTMENTS & TOWNHOMES

Families, military personnel and young professionals love that Crystal Beach Suites offers:

A coveted Crystal Beach location, one and two bedroom renovated apartments, three bedroom open-concept townhomes, recently renovated kitchens and bathrooms, and ensuite washer and dryers. Crystal Beach is renowned for its unique combination of a peaceful setting along the Ottawa River and some of the city's best shopping and restaurants. You're also just minutes from the Department of National Defence (Carling Campus), the Queensway Carleton Hospital, Bells Corners, the Nepean sailing club and expansive public parks.

Whether you are seeking a home for your family or your own private escape, we have a floor plan to meet your needs. Eat-in kitchens, updated bathrooms and ensuite laundry, to name just a few. Families love our community due to its close proximity to well-regarded schools and universities, while professionals can jump on the Queensway for a short 15-minute commute into Ottawa's downtown core.

BRAND NEW 1 BEDROOM, BARRY HOBIN DESIGN, CENTERTOWN ZIBI KANAAL CONDO

320 Miwate Private, Ottawa, K1R0E1

BRAND NEW! Be one of the few to experience Zibi: one of Canada's most sustainable communities, and rarely-seen upscale island living with downtown amenities.

Inspired by the traditional Dutch canal homes of Amsterdam, designed by Barry J. Hobin & Associates Architects Inc. “Kanaal” is the first residential building in the Zibi community.


The location of this condo is a perfect pairing of a convenient urban location surrounded by nature. The building sits on the edge of the canal, parks, Chaudiere Falls and a network of bike paths are all at your doorstep. You are also helping the environment by mitigating your carbon footprint thanks to the building LEED Platinum designation and revolutionary district thermal heating and cooling system.

description:
Sometimes it's better to spruce things up before listing such as what we did for this client (see pictures). Proud to share that after seeing the end results, the client decided to stay a few years longer in order to benefit from his newly refreshed Condo. Reno cost done at approximately the same amount as what the condo listing would have added up to had they sold.


We Changed a few things in both washrooms (Vanity and toilets) new paint new taps clean up floor grout, small backsplash, cleaned up old caulking with new fresh caulking...

As for the kitchen, client wanted to keep his existing cabinets, yet some had to be cut to new size such as MW such as the uppers over the island, Took as little as possible out of a wall to not effect flooring, ceilings and to not create too much electrical work, added a Backsplash and a few things more and VOILA!.


The client is OK with us using him as a testimonial, including condo visit.

Centreville. Elégant, votre chez-vous meublé haut dans le ciel. Nagez dans la piscine bien ensoleillée. Somnambulez et rêvez dans le jacuzzi agréablement chauffé. Maintenez votre santé dans la sauna chaude et les douches froides. Restez en forme dans le salon d’exercice physique. Reposez-vous dans les jardins élevés. Dirigez des réunions d’affaires dans les salles d’affaires professionnelles. Offrez des suites séparées à vos invités.
