address: Kent St, Ottawa, ON K2P 0W7, Canada
description:
Centropolis Furnished studio condo for rent at 429 Kent street.

Everything you need and more in this very cozy and central studio condo in the heart of Ottawa.

Steps from fabulous

Restaurants
Bars
Nightlife
Shopping
Parliament
TD place
VIP cineplex movie theater
Whole foods

The condo features hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, stainless steel appliances and ensuite laundry. Underground parking is available with most units. This building does not feature storage lockers. Enjoy beautiful Ottawa sunsets and summer BBQ’s on the spacious rooftop terrace, a common space for all residents. Centropolis Condo Ottawa also features a fitness room and bicycle storage in the lower level.

The condo is located on the 4th floor of a new 5 storey building.

Centropolis Condo is located in Centretown.
This area is conveniently nestled between Bronson St. and Elgin St. and is in close proximity to the Hwy 417. The downtown sector is 15 minutes from Ottawa International Airport, 10 minutes from the VIA Rail train station and 5 minutes from Ottawa’s Greyhound Station.

The hustle and bustle of business during the day is complemented by calm evenings. Nightlife isn’t far however, as Elgin St. and the Byward Market feature a wide array of restaurants and bars open late. Fine dining is prevalent in the area, including some of Ottawa’s best steakhouses and seafood eateries.

Cultured palettes will find thrill knowing Ottawa’s Chinatown and Little Italy are also nearby. This area also is home to many international grocery stores as well as local names. Shopping enthusiasts are close to The Rideau Centre and many boutiques. Centretown features Canadian culture as one of its main highlights. The National Arts Centre is home to some of the best performances, seminars, and exhibitions.

Email sales@urbanassetsrealtygroup.com to book a viewing

I encourage you to send me your email so I may forward the application to you as we are reviewing all applications by August 4 at 4pm. Responses will be sent out on August 5 at 5pm.


Here's a modern and beautiful (unfurnished) 3 bedroom end-unit townhouse for rent with finished basement in the South Nepean - Barrhaven area. Has a total of 3 washrooms (one is a powder room).

Location is ideal in beautiful Nepean at the border of Barrhaven and Nepean. Perfect location! This home is across the street from a park making it great for your kids and pets alike. There are 6 parks all within 10 minutes walking area. 7 minutes walk from St Andrew school, 4 minutes walk from Farley Mowat school, and others. 3 minutes drive to FreshCo, Tim Hortons and Starbucks (15 minute walk), 9 minutes drive from Stoneridge golf course. Minutes from the airport. This location has all the amenities you'll need nearby!

On the main floor you'll find a foyer with a lockable door leading to the garage to your left and a door leading to the powder room to your right. Further down the hall, you will find a separated dinning area. The kitchen too is separated and has dark colored cabinetry and backsplash giving it a modern look that compliments the modern appliances well. The demarcated living room features a fireplace and windows to brighten the room.

The main floor also has a walk out to a fenced backyard with deck for BBQs and lounging on summer days. Like gardening? The backyard has some gardening space should you have a green thumb, yet just enough that you won't have to do too much mowing.

Master bedroom is on the top floor. It comes equiped with an ensuite washroom that has both a shower and a tub. This room also has a walk in closet for your large collection of fashionable items.
The top floor also has two other rooms.

Laundry room is on this floor as well. This allows the person occupying the basement some privacy, should you decide to use the basement as a guest room.

Lower floor of the home has finished basement that can be used as a storage space, a family room, a guest room or a recreation room.

There's an attached garage that is big enough for a large sized car and driveway that fits two extra vehicles. There's a park a really short walk just across the street. Costco is just 4 minutes drive away.

• Tenant insurance will be required upon signing lease.
• Responsible and considerate Tenants only please
• Rent is $2,100 + utilities.
• Tenant is responsible for utilities (electricity, water, gas, hot water tank rental and rental insurance).
• Tenant is responsible for maintaining lawn and snow removal

description:
(All clutter, boxes, animals and pretty much everything except for the furniture in the photos is mine and will not be here for new tennant you will have bathroom shelves for your own needs. All the creams and makeup will be gone. Apartment will be much clearer and simple) Spacious Master bedroom with Air conditioning and an attached sunroom for rent in a 2 bedroom apartment. Tenant is a male blue collar worker so preferably a male. This place will be best suited for a student or professional who will be completely set up in their 2 spacious rooms as the other tenant uses the TV room from time to time. His room is half the size of the master with no sunroom so he doesn't spend a lot of time at home. You will have access to fully stocked shared kitchen with fridge, stove, microwave and chest freezer, TV room with sofa (from time to time as it is shared) dinning area with table and chairs, washroom with combo tub/shower and there is a large patio out back with a BBQ and table and chairs. The bedroom is approximately 12 feet by 12 feet. There is a regular closet plus a second smaller closet/storage. The windows are large and you get a lot of sunlight. The sunroom is approximately 6 feet by 8 feet and all windows except the divider wall between the apartments. The entrance to the sunroom is in the master bedroom. It is not insulated so needs an airconditioner in summer (ACprovided) It would make an adorable office, walk in closet or you could use it for storage. It's 2 rooms for the price of 1.

Heat

Hot water

Air conditioning

address: 199 Slater St., Ottawa, ON K1P 0A6, Canada
description:
The condo unit is located on Slater, between Bank and Metcalfe Street on the 19th floor with an open view facing West. It is available for rent as of August 1, 2020 and onwards.

COVID-19 has transformed our way of life. An increasing risk exists with commuting on public transit and the need for convenient access to needs-based facilities becomes ever so important. Reconsider the risk of shared apartment/housing with roommates.

This condo offers a secure, private and safe place for a potential tenant to work and/or study. The condo is in the heart of Ottawa’s downtown and commercial district area, and is 5 minutes away to Parliament and 15 minutes away to University of Ottawa by foot. In addition, you will have access to clinics, pharmacies, supermarkets, coffee shops, LCBO and malls all within nearby radius. Moreover, the building is only 3 years old!

The main doors are locked at all times and can only be opened using a buzzer and/or a fob key. There are cameras on the main level as well as in the elevators.

For condo amenities, the building has an indoor group-size theatre, a game room, a hot tub, a gym, and a party room. There is free public parking in front of the building after 5 PM on weekdays and at all times on weekends. Bike parking can be included with this condo (if requested). Pets and smoking are not permitted.

The condo is currently furnished with one (1) Queen size bed, and two (2) Corporate Black Leola Chairs that can be turned each into a single bed. Furniture can be removed if preferred.


Important Rules

Due to COVID-19, some facilities listed above might be tentatively restricted or closed (i.e. public amenities and local outside-the-condo facilities). The following items will be required of the tenant before signing of the lease agreement: proof of income, reference required, credit report, minimum one (1) year lease (longer lease preferred), and first and last month rent deposit upon signing. For more information, please message me at JamesGo.815@gmail.com.

This luxurious 1226 square foot corner unit with 2 bedrooms and two full baths has hardwood flooring, large windows, a gas fireplace and a large balcony for summer enjoyment and the BBQ. description:
This luxurious 1226 square foot corner unit with 2 bedrooms and two full baths has hardwood flooring, large windows, a gas fireplace and a large balcony for summer enjoyment and the BBQ. North facing windows get plenty of natural light. Open concept main rooms and a private master suite with a walk through closet area and 3pc bathroom. The open concept kitchen has stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, tiled backsplash, lots of cupboard /counter space and a kitchen island with a cafe eating area. The main space is versatile and provides great enjoyment areas that have good natural light.


The Everett is located in the sought after urban neighbourhood of Centre town just west of Bank St. Low rise building built by Domicile. Known for being an excellent place to live and has been well managed.


You’ll be within walking distance to all that Urban Living has to offer. Transitway, LRT station, great bike lanes shopping and the best restaurants are all so close you can walk to them or order pick up. Farm boy, corner store, drug store all within 2 blocks.
